Your comments have been shared with the entire management staff and the agents have been rewarded on exceeded your expectations. Thank you again for your time and look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: The staff was pleasant from the time I drove up to the valet until I checked out.  I appreciated them making me feel like a valued guest.  Close to many places to eat and shop, making it convenient for traveling or just a place to relax
Manager Response: Hello Rich M,  Thank you for taking the time to reaching out to us in regards to your recent stay. I am so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective department has been complimented for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: My 14 and 3 year old were stuck in an elevator at your facility which could have been easily avoided. Due to lack of caring the elevator was not fixed the first time it was stuck during our short stay.
Manager Response: Hello U7879PNtanyas,  Thank you for your feedback about your recent stay at the Doubletree Club Hotel Orange County Airport, CA. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any aggravation or inconvenience experienced during your visit. Comments from our guests enable us to continually improve and exceed those standards. Please be confident that we will follow-up on the points you have outlined to avoid recurrence. The time taken along with the effort made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. Feedback from our guests is vitally important in our mission to be the first choice of the world’s travelers. We want you as our guest and are hopeful that you will afford us the opportunity to provide lodging services in the future. Thanks for your ongoing loyalty and understanding.

Summary: Great location for OC.  Great staff and very helpful during my groups stay.  The breakfast is very good with different items each morning.  I have stayed at this hotel in the past and will stay here again when my travels take me to this location
Manager Response: Hello TerrywJ2251ER,  Thank you so much for taking a moment to share your positive comments with us in regards to your recent stay. I'm very happy to read that you had a wonderful experience with us! We pride ourselves in bringing the best in customer service, and I'm happy to hear that we were able to do just that! We sincerely thank you for the warm comments and are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Stayed during a business trip. The overall experience was great , they have helpful staff from the time of arrival to breakfast. Nice property and easy to get to places in Orange County. Breakfast buffet offered great options like burritos and fruit bar.
Manager Response: Hello Revi,  Thank you for taking the time to reach out about your recent stay. I am pleased to see that you had a great experience and how much you enjoyed the breakfast buffet. Please know that I have passed along your comments to the respective departments and complimented on a job well done. We look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: Came for wedding and family of bride got stuck in elevator and front desk didn't even care it seemed. Took over 25 min for firemen to show up and 1 hr 15 min to get out. We were late to wedding and dirty. Also the toilet didn't work well, a.c. units were dirty and broke knobs, front desk rude, room keys wouldn't work 1/2 time. Internet didn't work at all and when I asked they said then I guess don't work. Definitely one of the worst stays we've had and will never stay again even if free.
Manager Response: Hello 976keanut,  I am truly sorry to hear of this and would like to express my sincere apologies for falling short of our commitment to extend a rewarding experience. The issues you mentioned have been brought to the attention of the respective department heads to ensure that they are rectified to prevent any guest inconvenience. Once again, I would like to thank you for your review.

Summary Heading: Great front desk staff make this an excellent property!
Summary: Very friendly welcome to this property!  Manager Gary Hattendorf was incredible friendly when welcoming arriving guests.  Jasmine and Octavio at the front desk were helpful and quickly checked us in!  I will be back to this property
Manager Response: Hello Richard,  Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport. Thank you so much for sharing your positive comments with us. I was so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective department has been complimented for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Stayed at the DoubleTree Club last weekend when visiting family and had a good experience. The room was very clean and looks like it was recently renovated.  The staff was friendly too.  We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Hello Alex,  Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your recent stay. I was so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective department has been complimented for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Disappointed that my Honor member # could not be entered at time of check in, however after I came back from dinner, I approached a different front desk staff and she was able to enter my Honor Member # without any difficulties.
Manager Response: Hello 443chauc,  Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay. I was so glad to read that we were able to accommodate you with getting your account added to the reservation. I would like to apologize that it did take 2 separate visits to accomplish this. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: I adored my current visit to DoubleTree in Orange County. I was there for business and delighted in the gathering/meeting space for work. It is a tremendous lodging with numerous luxuries and I will go back for joy!
Manager Response: Hello Malaskiclaygemillerm,  I would like to thank you for your time and filling out this survey. I am so pleased to read that we were able to exceed your expectations and we certainly are looking forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: Good facility in great location for the price. short distance from the airport and shopping center and Orange County art centers. The cookies are delicious and i asked for two and received two!!! Bathroom amenities are at  average quality.
Manager Response: Hello Zohrehz111,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. I am happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and received some extra cookies. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the not too distant future!

Summary: Major shout out to AJ for making my stay great... from the moment I walked into the lobby, he was attentive to my every need. My room is spacious & over all excellent. After staying in a lot of AirBnBs lately; it’s great to be in a great hotel! I highly recommend this place!
Manager Response: Hello David,  Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay. Thank you so much for sharing your positive comments with us which I have gladly passed on. I was so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective department has been complimented for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Close to the airport, awesome staff with GREAT Customer Service!  No complaints! Very impressed with the customer service of the shuttle driver.  Welcoming staff upon arrival.  Very comfy beds and pillows.
Manager Response: Hello A4032CFandreat,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out an online survey in regards to your stay. I was so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay and had a great encounter with our valet and hotel team members. I have shared your message with the entire team and complimented them for providing great customer service. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: The cookies were definitely warm as promised. The Wi-Fi connection was not properly working during my stay. I  had to use my data which was not really a problem because my purpose was not to stay in the room/hotel all day long. The beds were extremely comfortable and staff there greeted me right away and were extremely nice.

Summary Heading: Poor reception service, knowledge and attitude
Summary: Avoid if staying more than one night. Noise of the freeway next to the window. Noise of the jets landing/taking off. Room decor fits the 60s. Do not expect food service whilst at the pool unless it is after 5pm?

There was a huge wedding going on... but front desk was fast at check in, answering questions regarding parking and room was clean and cool. Bell hop was friendly, hotel was neat and clean, ice machine located close to elevator

Summary Heading: Don't even think about drinking to coffee at breakfast
Summary: Hotel room was fine, but check-in left something to be desired.  Don't bother doing online check-in, you will just have to go through the whole process when you arrive.  Keys were not ready, digital key I requested online was not ready.  Room was ready and quiet and comfortable. My biggest problem, some may call it minor, was that the coffee in the dining room for breakfast was undrinkable.  The worst I have ever tasted.  Staff apparently don't drink the coffee and were unhelpful. I know, it is a minor thing unless you need coffee to start your day.  I would not have written this review except that after I filled out their review online, they requested that I fill out a TripAdvisor review.

Summary Heading: Great business hotel by the lake
Summary: This is an older but well-kept property in a quiet commercial/residential neighborhood.  The hotel sits next to a pleasant man-made pond with a fountain and walking path, surrounded by office towers and condos.  There is no shopping or dining within walking distance.  Parking is strictly regulated but convenient.  The Doubletree has all of the essentials of a good business hotel, 24 hr business center, small fitness room, good breakfast buffet, plus an outdoor pool and hot tub.  Rooms are basic but clean and comfortable; the standard WiFi was a bit slow but you can buy upgraded service.  Guests are also treated to good friendly front desk service and a warm cookie on check-in.

The location is excellent!!  and overall everything was good.  my only complaint is they charge extra for parking and breakfast when both of those are often included. but overall a good hotel choice in the John Wayne airport area.

Modern nice stay really nice pond on property! Room was well kept. Bar was nicely located, had the salmon dinner which was very tasty with the rice and veggies, I would recommend staying here ! I took Lyft but, they offer parking for $11 each night!

Summary Heading: Good location but poor quality room
Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights for a family function. The hotel has a good location and is quiet, but the rooms are in need of updates. The AC/ventilation was my main qualm. Unit was loud and the room was stuffy/muggy/humid the entire time. I desperately wanted to open a window for fresh air but the windows don't open.  The shower is old, and the fixtures outdated. In room safe was locked when we checked into the room and TV not working. Beds are fine. This feels like a lower tier Doubletree. There is a regular Doubletree down the street which is likely better than this Club hotel.

Summary Heading: Way to treat an old customer...
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel for the last 8 years for an annual trade show, renting a couple rooms each time.  In the past, the staff has ALWAYS treated everyone so well, with big smiles & helpful attitudes.   This year, we were treated with impatience & eye rolling at check in, while we got our credit card info out for them.  Guess we weren't fast enough..did they have somewhere else to be?  We just ignored it, got our keys & went up to the room.  Both rooms smelled like a cross between cigar smoke & mold.  It was late, so we ignored that too.  The following day, we were working the trade show, so didn't get back until late. We grabbed a bottle of febreeze & sprayed both rooms so we could sleep.  Fast-forward to check out...We didn't want our employees driving home tired, so

The hotel is tucked away in a quiet area.  There is a nice pond with walking trail and they have a shuttle to and from John Wayne Airport.  Very nice business stop-over.  I got there late and left on the earliest shuttle but the staff was very friendly and helpful.  I will definitely stay here again as I have in the past when traveling here on business.

Summary Heading: Tired but great location.  Does not represent Hilton well because it is wearing out
Summary: Wonderful location, in dire need for renovation.  The location is outstanding, close to the airport and a peaceful small lake with a quarter mile walking/running trail.  located adjacent to the freeway but you don't realize it except some traffic evening noise in your room. Best to reserve a room facing away from freeway.

Rooms need a makeover, air conditioning unit is horribly loud, charge an additional $11 for parking, no continental breakfast included, $5 for two coffees in the morning and the server made it seem as if he was giving me a deal from the normal rate of $3 each, and leftover pieces of dog food found on carpet from previous stayer.

I have stayed in this hotel three times for scrapbooking workshops.  The staff has been largely unchanged over the last years.  This tells me it's a good place to work and well-managed.  The staff is unfailingly courteous, going the extra mile to make sure everyone's needs were met.  I would stay here for other Orange County trip.

This is a great hotel with a friendly staff and clean rooms. The bartender Julio is wonderful and the food at the bar is delicious. And served quickly. The Philly cheesesteak sandwich is served piping hot in soft bread with lots of meat.  LocTion is excellent with complimentary shuttle service from John Wayne Airport.

I explained everything in the previous sections.  This hotel was one of the worst I've stayed at and nothing has been done to make it right.  I don't think I will be staying at this hotel in the future.  The only thing I liked about this hotel was the cookies they provided.  Double tree was a great hotel chain before Hilton took over.
Manager Response: Hello PetersL8798ZD,  I would like to thank you for taking the time to complete this survey for your stay. Please accept our team’s sincere apology for the failures in service that resulted in any inconvenience and lack of comfort. If you can reach out to me directly at (snafm_dk@Hilton.com) so I can get a better understanding of your recent stay, I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to Make It Right. Again, thank you for taking the time to reach out.

Summary: Asked beforehand if there was going to be a deposit was told no. Then got there and boom $50 deposit for one night. Then was told no running water for the night because of maintenance. They could of told me this when I was booking my room. And last my daughter was visiting with me for a couple hours and was charged over night parking. Ridiculous!
Manager Response: Hello 832arturod,  I would like to thank you for taking the time to reach out and give us your feedback about your recent stay at the Doubletree Club Hotel Orange County Airport, CA. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any aggravation or inconvenience experienced during your visit. Comments from our guests enable us to continually improve and exceed those standards. The deposit is an incidental authorization not a deposit, this is to cover items such as room service or other items charged to the room. Please be confident that we will follow-up on additional points you have outlined to the correct departments to help avoid such late notice and future recurrence.

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, nice rooms, comfortable beds
Summary: Greeted with a smile, and all staff I encountered were friendly and accommodating. I slept very well, and the room service was great. It's always nice to have a warm cookie waiting for you. I booked because of a short trip and proximity to the airport. I didn't want to rent a car, so the shuttle service was exactly what I needed.
Manager Response: Hello Monica,  Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport. Thank you so much for sharing your positive comments with us which I have gladly passed on. I was so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective department has been complimented for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: This hotel has the best staff in the business from the person who picks you up at the airport to the dining room staff that ensure you have all that you need. This hotel is clean clean clean and has someone alway available to assistance you. Great place, food, staff!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport.   Thank you so much for sharing your positive comments with us which I have gladly passed on. I was so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective department has been complimented  for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Very limited parking.  Be prepared to circle the lot, and pay for parking.  Some hotel features show age.  Rooms smell old and musty.  Mini-fridge did not working.  Little annoyances that makes this hotel miss the mark on value for the price.  But it looks pretty.  The location is good for travel around Santa Ana.  But travel back up on
Manager Response: Hello Paul D,  Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay. I would like to apologize for the issues you encountered. Please know that I will pass your comments to the respective departments to ensure we are double checking rooms and utilities. Again, thank you for your time.

Summary: Warning to all: In house Reservation esp the manager are quite deceitful. They quoted me with different rates as charged complained about it& at numerous time. By the time, my sister was to check in for another room, the rates are even higher. Complaining about it was futile and just made us more upset. In fact they are so guilty that they did not send me An email to Review their hotel for they know that I will address their behaviors. It was so bad that I move my Sister & her partner to another hotel. Their only saving grace was the Cookies, the Evening Security Guard & Valet Personnel.  Definitely a Bad Representation for all Doubletree/ Hilton establishment!!!
Manager Response: Hello Ajmarco,  Thank you for your comments about your recent stay at the Doubletree Club Hotel Orange County Airport, CA. I would like to express my sincere apologies for falling short of our commitment to extend a rewarding experience during your stay. I would truly appreciate if you can contact me directly so I can find out more about your reservations and the agents you spoke with. This is certainly not indicative of the standards we are measured against for our guests, and I have discussed this with the rest of our team so we can make necessary changes. I appreciate you letting us know of your stay.  Email: SNAFM_DK@HILTON.COM

Summary: This hotel was home base for a week for us during PGF Nationals. Great location with a full service restaurant and bar. Laundry facility was adequate. Staff was friendly and efficient. Made us feel at home.
Manager Response: Hello Russ C,  Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport. Thank you so much for sharing your positive comments with us which I have gladly passed on. I was so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective department has been complimented for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: This Hotel has really gone down hill over the years.
Summary: The Double Tree Club Orange County Airport has always been my go to hotel when we are frequently staying in the area either for my husband's business trips or personal trips we are making to visit family and friends.  However the last several trips since mid 2016 have been very disappointing.  Any trip we are there during the week the Water has been shut off for the better part of at least one day while we are there.  Last year notices about holding elevator would break them.  This last trip we stayed and 2 out of the 3 days we were there the elevators were shut down completely had to take stairs throughout the day.   Not to mention their window AC units are very noisy so the only way to sleep at night is with them turned off which in July is not good alternative either.  We
Manager Response: Hello Kjinhu,  Thank you for your feedback about your recent stay. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any aggravation or inconvenience experienced during your visit. Comments from our guests enable us to continually improve and exceed those standards. Please be confident that we will follow-up on the points you have outlined to the respective departments. The time taken along with the effort made to share your comments with us is most appreciated.

Summary Heading: Happy at the Double Tree Orange County
Summary: Really enjoyed the proximity to John Wayne orange county airport very easy to check in and check out. The cleanliness of our room was very  impressive..finally got a complete nights sleep and a wonderful mattress and pillows.
Manager Response: Hello Patricia,  I am very pleased to hear of your great experience with the hotel and comfort of the mattress and pillows. I have shared your kind words with the staff and department heads. We hope to see you again when your travels send you out to our area.

Summary: King rooms would be fine if you don't need to use the pull out couch bed.  You will feel every spring and bar under the material stretched over them.  Flimsy and lumpy.  Highly do not recommend.  Staff has been instructed to not let guests bring food from outside vendors to their patio dining area out side.  But you can take it to the pool if you like.  Also, the cookies are only available for check in time only.  You may not ask for another.  The elevator rarely works.  Wait time for the one that may or may not be working is 8-10 minutes.
Manager Response: Hello Lorraine,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out this survey for your stay at the Doubletree-Santa Ana, CA. I would like to apologize that our services fell short of your expectation. Comments such as yours are great tools for us as we use that for re-training our team to ensure each guest has a great time whilst staying with us. The issues you mention have been brought to the attention of the respective department heads to ensure that they are rectified to prevent any guest inconvenience. Once again, I would like to thank you for your review.

Summary: I stay here when I can for travel to Irvine.  The hotel is midsize, which I like better than huge properties.  There is a lake view.  It's close to the 55, the 405 and the 5.  There is shopping close by at Fashion Island.  Also it's close to the Orange County airport.  I guess this boils down to a comfortable and convenient hotel.  Also, a real surprise was there room service.  I ordered a steak salad and didn't have high expectations, but I was pleasantly surprised.  The meat was tender, tasty, and cooked it exactly the way I asked.  It was a perfect d and satisfying dinner.  I would stay here again and order room service again.  I had breakfast down stairs.  I didn't have a lot of time, so tried to order breakfast to be ready when I came downstairs.  They had my breakfast
Manager Response: Hello Cali-Native2015,  Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay. Thank you so much for sharing your positive comments with us which I have gladly passed on. I was so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective department has been complimented for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Staff needs attitude adjust, Rooms need Maint, housekeepers need training. Room was gross. Sheets & bath towels were old & frayed. I had to re-clean the room myself.  It's the toothpaste on the faucet and sticky stuff on the night stand that just grosses me out.
Manager Response: Hello Debbre,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out this survey for your recent stay. I would like to apologize that our services fell short of your expectation. Comments such as yours are great tools for us as we use that for re-training our team to ensure each guest has a great time whilst staying with us. The issues you mention have been brought to the attention of the respective department heads to ensure that they are rectified to prevent any guest inconvenience. Once again, I would like to thank you for your review.

Summary Heading: Doubletree Club in Santa Ana, CA.
Summary: This stay was terrible from beginning to end. Inside is dark, dingy and has musty smell. Inaccurate bill at end; charged for parking and didn't have a car. Service poor at bar. $100 incidentals charge of which I was unaware prior to check-in.
Manager Response: Hello Bethd548,  I would like to first thank you for taking the time to filling out this survey. This survey helps us in improving our customer service as well as address any and all issues encountered by our guests. Please accept our sincerest apologies for inaccuracy of bill and service at the bar. This is certainly not indicative of the standards we are measured against for our guests. The issues you mentioned have been brought to the attention of the respective department heads to ensure that they are rectified to prevent any guest inconvenience.

Summary: Usual high quality from Hilton and I am always amazed by how many Hilton hotels are in this area.  Routine stay with no issues.  Was worried about parking based on previous reviews but we were there on a Saturday night and had absolutely no issues.  Ate dinner in the restaurant and it was fine with a nice lake outside where you can relax.  Comfortable beds and clean room as expected along with a decent little workout area.  Would not hesitate to book again.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: But a few extra bucks will be worth it not to stay in this place, which Hilton appears to have set aside for the cheap motel experience. The internet connection and speed are horrendous. The shower and tub were totally dilapidated. The carpet was sticky. The pullout sofa bed is a Twin size, so the when they say a room can accommodate 4 guests they are lying.

From digital check in that didn't work to broken faucet in the sink, this was not the best that Hilton puts forth. Numerous process inefficiencies made this stay frustrating and something not to be repeated. The parking attendants were required to man the elevator, because apparently "some kids" were pushing all the buttons and holding the doors open ... not unexpected for kids; however, these actions evidently overwhelm the elevator and cause it to shut down. The solution: move the parking attendants into the elevator to push buttons on this six-story building. Hunh???  Side note: If you want free breakfast, regardless whether you stayed at this Doubletree, come on over. Apparently, this breakfast buffet is free to everyone. People were wandering off the street and eating the

Summary Heading: Poor AC, internet and low ceilings
Summary: My Notes  •	Don’t stay here again (pick the DT without “Club”) - there is a much better DT less than a mile away - and I didn't remember which one was which one. •	Low ceilings •	No lobby •	AC in room is horrible (room 626) •	Internet access spotty •	Not a good DT

This the worst hotel I have ever stayed at in my life! I called the hotel around 4pm to let them know that I was going to be getting in at midnight and to make sure to have a room ready for me.  The manager on duty was so rude on the phone when I requested to get a room with a king size bed and told me it was an upgrade of $50.  I told her I would just keep my standard double bed room. I check into my room and it's a handicap accessible room.  No where on my reservation does it say I wanted a handicap room.  The manager who I spoke to purposely reserved a handicap room for me bc she was being a RUDE!  Dean the "manager on duty" told me the hotel was sold out, yet 4 people checked in after me!!!  Everyone knows that hotels reserve rooms for people who are checking in late, but he

I loved my recent visit to DoubleTree in Orange County. I was there for business and enjoyed the conference/meeting space for work. It is a huge hotel with many amenities and I will travel back for pleasure!

Found this hotel close by where I was working and have now chosen to stay there almost exclusively when in the area. The location is fantastic, easy access to highways, plenty of places to dine be it fast food or high end and the service here is just the very best ever.

We enjoyed our visit to Orange County.  Our room was in the third floor. It was spacious. A King Suite with pull out coach. My daughter enjoyed the privacy. My wife and I enjoyed the room along with amenities the hotel had to offer. Shuttle to airport was great and their signature cookies were great.  The staff was able to help when Booking.com gave us the wrong room the first night.  The staff returned items we had forgot in our rooms. Their continental breakfast is awesome. Particularly like carrot cake muffin. My daughter enjoyed the fitness room.  I would definitely return.

Avoid this "hotel". It will fail your expectations on every level. The rooms are poor and the service is worse.  The management doesn't seem to care. The breakfast is below average, and so are the rooms.

The hotel is nice on the inside and out.  Located on a well kept business pond to relaxingly walk around after a hard day.  Night patio to go with it as well. Service was great all around. The housekeeping touches were better than I'm use to (outside of an expectedly clean room), it's the little things that add up: soap on the tub, glass by the sink, softest sheets ever, etc.

Lovely service, comfortable rooms, great amenities, the staff is great, the cookies (of course) are delicious, and it has a LAKE! Honest - not a big one, mind you, but still - a lake with ducks that you can feed! Even if you are the staunchest, most serious business person in the world, you can't help but become a child again when you're feeding those ducks.

Went on this trip for a sports tournament. Overall pretty good stay, clean rooms, pool, nice area. Only gripe is if traveling far be aware of late check in and if more than four in the family breakfast option will not work.

The bed was comfortable, the room was clean, the shower had good pressure, I didnt eat at the restaurant.  The parking is a nightmare there.  I arrived by 7pm each day that I stayed there and was getting the last spot in the lot each day.  They end up valeting all the later cars and double-park them throughout the driveways to get all cars onsite.

The room was clean and comfortable, but the furniture was very worn and the sofa had several noticeable stains all over.  Service at check in and check out was good.   The towels offered to guests using the pool were disgusting. I am a guy, and I'm not a clean freak. I am not a germaphobe. But these towels were beyond unacceptable.  All of them had holes and/or significant stains. They were similar to rags that a cleaning person uses. I am sympathetic to hotel owners, as clean towels are always a big cost in hotel operations. But I couldn't believe someone determined they were acceptable for customers to use.

Summary Heading: Worst service ever experienced at a Doubletree
Summary: I have filed a complaint with Hilton Honors. We have close to half a million Hilton points.  You would think the front staff would treat you accordingly.  They have no common manners (with the exception of Kathy).  The reservation process was incorrect the closet had a hole to the attic in it causing dust to accumulate on our formal evening ware.  I find it difficult to believe management was not aware of this problem.    P.S. Very important...I just received an e-mail from corporate Hilton Honors stating that the hotel had contacted me and resolved any issues....THIS IS A COMPLETE LIE!!!    I HAVE NOT BEEN CONTACTED BY ANYONE.

Near Airport and Santa Anna and Newport beach. Professional, clean and reasonable price. Parking is not free even it is not in the city center. Well maintain facility. Quiet neighborhood. Shuttle to the nearby airport.

I stayed here because it was close to Santa Ana airport for my early flight the following day.  Great hotel, courteous staff, and very clean room.  Treated like royalty when I arrived, with valet parking and a warm cookie.

This is a perfectly located hotel, with great staff. The free breakfast is a full breakfast with eggs, meat, potatoes, breads, furits and coffee. The room service is above great always ensures you get what you ordered. You will love you stay here!
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport. Thank you so much for sharing your positive comments with us. I was so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective departments have been complimented for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: There was a bug in our room, staff came to get it and then we had to call them back because they took the piece of pop tart instead of the bug!!!! We had to call down to the desk and housekeeping had to come back twice!

The overall service and support from the staff at this hotel was one of the worst I've ever experienced.  I travel approximately 50 weeks out of the year and almost exclusively stay at Hilton properties and this by far fell below all expectations.

This is more of an airport type hotel for business travelers.   Valet not there full time, no bellmen, restaurant not open much. No real lobby to hang out/meet up in.  There is a lovely pond to walk around and tables to have your morning coffee at.

This DoubleTree is located centrally to many of Orange County's venues.  Sadly, it is easily 15 years over due for general upgrades to both the common areas and guest rooms.  This property is very reasonably priced, but know what you are getting in exchange.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about your recent stay at the Doubletree Club Hotel Orange County Airport, CA. I would like to apologize that our facility fell short of your expectations. The issues you mention have been brought to the attention of the upper management staff.  Once again, I would like to thank you for your review.

Summary: I had left a few items in my car and needed to retrieve them later that night after I checked in but could not find a staff member or valet person to locate my car to retrieve said items.  It was a ghost town.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about your recent stay at the Doubletree Club Hotel Orange County Airport, CA. I would like to apologize that our services fell short of your expectation. Comments such as yours are great tools for us as we use that for re-training our team to ensure each guest has a great time whilst staying with us. The issue you mentioned has been brought to the attention of the respective department heads to ensure that they are rectified to prevent any guest inconvenience.   Once again, I would like to thank you for your review.

Summary: it's a little difficult to find which also translates to secluded and very quiet. it's very clean and quiet. good for a good, much needed rest! friendly staff. valet parking same price as self parking so take advantage of the valet parking! picturesque setting. upgrade to lake view if you can but don't pay too much for it. take a walk and enjoy it and save your money!

Stayed here last night as a little getaway for myself. Older hotel located in the business area of Santa Ana. Front desk staff was super friendly and very informative. The rooms look like they may have been softly remodeled recently. I had a beautiful view of Lake Hutton and the surrounding buildings. They have fridges and pullout sofabeds. Service at the bar was awesome. I slept like a baby because the beds are SO comfortable!

Enjoyed staying at the Doubletree. King room was spacious and comfortable. The staff was helpful and pleasant. Had dinner there also. Food and service was excellent. This hotel by Joan Wayne Airport in Santa Ana was also clean and quiet.

staff and amenities were excellent. hotel is close to airport and numerous restaurants are in the local area. the cookies are great. the parking is convenienent right next to the hotel. the fitness center is well stocked with precor equipment

Summary Heading: a safe place to stay for older people
Summary: felt safe and so clean.  also very quite.  if you are alone and a senior this was a great place to stay and very close to airport.  that is my reason for staying so i could get shuttle service.  nice area also.

Disappointed because of parking charge especially when no parking was available on second night there. Hotel overbooked to noisy large wedding groups who overwhelmed the parking facilities and required security to intervene with noisy celebrants.   Going online to access Internet service very poor.  The make it right commitment was not honored at this hotel.  Management somewhat detached and unconcerned with my requests.

We enjoyed our stay at this hotel!  We encountered no problems while we were there.  We have stayed at this property numerous times and we always feel like we are well taken care of.  The staff are always very friendly & nice to us.

I highly recommend this hotel. I had an excellent stay. Room was great, very clean. Staff was warm and accommodating. Nice bar and restaurant. Great location. I will stay again next I am in time in town.

Summary Heading: Quiet yet close to John Wayne Airport
Summary: Great place that feels out of the way yet close to airport, shopping. Staff was very quick to please.  Room was overlooking the little lake, very relaxing. Price was good. Very clean.  Good menu, excellent service was tops.

Summary Heading: I stay here frequently when traveling for work.
Summary: I think the overall service and comfort are good, the same as what you would expect from most name brand hotels.  Check in process is always fine, rooms are normal size and clean.  The fitness center is too small, but it works.  I travel to this area for work frequently and I always stay here because I can walk to dinner nearby, and I never have any complaints.  Waiter, Tony, who works in the restaurant at breakfast time is so friendly, his service is excellent.

It's amazing the difference a few blocks can make. This hotel is a stones throw from another Double Tree and yet the service is from a different planet. The staff does not understand the idea of warmth, comfort or customer appreciation. They seem to have a very lax attitude toward making sure your stay is enjoyable. It should be a great hotel but seriously misses the mark just due to poor customer service and lack of effort!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about your recent stay at the Doubletree Club Hotel Orange County Airport, CA. I would like to express my sincere apologies for falling short of our commitment to extend a rewarding experience due to unsatisfactory customer service during your stay. The Voice of our Customers is critical to ensuring our guests receive a rewarding experience when staying at the Hilton Portfolio of Brands. Thank you for bringing this concern to our attention. The issue you mentioned has been brought to the attention of the respective department heads to ensure that they are rectified to prevent any guest inconvenience.

Summary: We had an excellent experience. Great service, and comfortable rooms. Room was clean was a beautiful view of lake. The scenery inspired us to take walks several times during our two night stay. Breakfast was very good, better on the weekend than weekday.

Summary Heading: There are better options in the area
Summary: This hotel is outdated, and not as comfortable as other options in the area. The beds are old, there are not enough outlets conveniently located for charging devices, and there was mold under the fixtures in the bathroom. I work in the area often, and I recommend staying at other Hilton properties in this area. There are several which have been updated, and are comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your recent stay at the Doubletree Club Hotel Orange County Airport, CA. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any aggravation or inconvenience experienced during your visit. Comments from our guests enable us to continually improve and exceed those standards. Please be confident that we will pass along the points you have outlined to avoid recurrence. The time taken along with the effort made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. Feedback from our guests is vitally important in our mission to be the first choice of the world’s travelers. We want you as our guest and are hopeful that you will afford us the opportunity to provide lodging services in the future.

Summary: Longtime Diamond Member here. I stayed here for a couple of nights on a Fri and Sat for business.  The location of this hotel is not easy to get to unless you are using GPS. Parking is also a little cramped and cost $11 a night.  I was fortunate enough to get a corner room next to a street. To my pleasant surprise the room was very quiet.  Jacuzzi and the pool are spacious and just right. Jacuzzi is neither too hot nor too cool.  The restaurant staff was very helpful as I got back late both nights and they worked with me to get me some food. The breakfast is standard Doubletree quality. You won't be disappointed.  Although I didn't go out, there are plenty of places to eat, and the restaurant has a nice view of a large concrete waterpond next to the business park.  As there are

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel and great service
Summary: The service at the Hotel is quite exceptional from the front desk to the bar.  The rooms do need some updating and the breakfast is about a 7 out of 10.  The bed is extremely comfortable!  Again, the service that we have had from the staff has been remarkable.

Summary: I've always enjoyed this hotel.  The price is acceptable and valet parking isn't pricey. The amenities are superb. There are restaurants in walking distance and other local attractions. Freeway close and near the airport.

Summary: Excellent efficient shuttle service to John Wayne airport, very welcoming front desk staff.  Restaurant basically a bar food experience.  Rooms need redo.  Just tired, especially sagging bed and pillows used too many times.  Clean. AC the old in wall unit that cycles on and off, either too hot or too cold.  OK for overnight.

Summary: Hotel was in fair location and provided and average staff, could of been much better, staff was not as great as at other Doubltree hotels that I have stayed in.  Staff needs more training on how to handle problems, cookie was a couple of days old and hard had to throw it away

Summary: Always nice to stay and feel right at home. We went to visit a family member for the night and went to a nearby amusement park. The hotel was perfect for a overnight stay. Even though we only live  one hour and half away.

Summary: nice view of the ducks in the pond even a few turtles don't feed ducks with bread from hotel the the restaurant guy there gets a little salty using your breakfast bread to feed ducks ..I did anyway FYI. :-P
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport. I was  glad to read that you enjoyed the location. I also wanted to bring to your attention that feeders are available on the lakeside for visitors that want to feed the ducks. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Very friendly staff, rooms and hotel are super clean the outside lake view is amazing and benches outside make you feel comfortable and relaxed while staying there while relaxing and loocking at the ducks swimming by you.

The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Very small and older resort.  No cots available and if there was, the rooms are so small it would have been tight.  The staff did not provide friendliness/service that I have experienced with other Double Tree's. Moved to Hampton Inn and room was twice the size and staff extremely friendly!

Comments from our guests enable us to continually improve and exceed those standards. The time taken along with the effort made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We want you as our guest and are hopeful that you will give us another opportunity to provide lodging services in the future.  Thanks for your ongoing loyalty and understanding.

Summary: Great business trip stay location. I would stay and recommend this location to my co workers. The room was very relaxing and clean. The value was great. The breakfast had a large variety of items to choose.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport. I was so glad to read that your stay met your expectations and will be recommending our hotel to your co-workers. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective departments have been complimented  for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: an Oasis behind the Orange Curtain
Summary: This Hotel has truly "old school" service.  The rooms were comfortable and the rate was extremely reasonable for the area. I look forward to coming back and trying out other amenities. Wendy at the front desk went above and beyond always thanking me for letting her help me.  The room was comfortable and clean, it reminded me of the old Hilton hotels like the fabled Hong Kong Hilton where I stayed on several occasion before it was torn down. You won't regret choosing this airport hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport. Thank you so much for sharing your positive comments with us which I have gladly passed on. I was so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. It is always a pleasure to hear that Wenddy provided excellent service during your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective departments have been complimented  for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Staff were great and helped with anything asked.  Great location, quiet rooms, clean and comfortable.  Would recommend.  Great place to stay.  Family of 4 had 2 rooms for a getaway.  A quiet neighborhood with easy access and a fountain pond to sit around.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective departments have been complimented  for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: SIMPLE & DECENT BUT (LAKE NOT AS COOL AS IT SEEMS)
Summary: Booked this room since it was cheaper then hotels in front of the beach and wanted to be somewhat close to Huntington Beach, not too far away from New Port and Laguna. Before I go into my pros and cons - I'd like to say that they sell the lake view BUT lake view (man made lake) is not such a view. It's a little lake among huge building's with a couple of ducks. I'd say it's more of a huge fountain.   Pros:  Cheaper than hotels by the beach and close to the beaches.  Service is great. Staff is very friendly.  You get a cookie when you arrive  You get complimentary water (arrowhead bottle) if you are part of the hilton honors program (which is free)  Rooms are big and not small.  You get free-wifi if you are part of the hilton honors program (free to sign up)  You get a cheaper
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to respond to our survey.  I would like to apologize that our services fell short of your expectation. Comments such as yours are great tools for us as we use that for re-training our team to ensure each guest has a great time whilst staying with us. The issues you mention have been brought to the attention of the respective department heads to ensure that they are rectified to prevent any guest inconvenience.  The Voice of our Customers is critical to ensuring our guests receive a rewarding experience when staying at the Hilton Portfolio of Brands. Thank you for bringing this concern to our attention.

Summary: Minutes from the airport; clean and quiet.  Nothing special, nothing really wrong either.  Just a basic room that is getting tired, not really worthy of the Hilton name.  Note there are TWO Hilton Double Tree's.  This is the Club and then one across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about your recent stay at the Doubletree Club Hotel Orange County Airport, CA. The Voice of our Customers is critical to ensuring our guests receive a rewarding experience when staying at the Hilton Portfolio of Brands. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary Heading: Stayed for the Huntington Beach Marathon
Summary: My wife and I came for the Huntington Beach Marathon weekend. We checked in on Saturday and were greeted at check in and given packets filled with information and our wrist bands for marathon shuttle access, included in our stay. That night there was a great pasta bar with veggies and chicken breasts, which was perfect for the night before dinner.  The morning of we had a really great continental breakfast spread before the shuttle came and took us. Overall the experience was fantastic. The hot tub out back was great after the run. It's out of the hustle of the beachfront Huntington, where we had stayed in the past. I appreciated the more relaxed atmosphere after running 26.2 miles! I'd definitely do it again!
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport. Thank you so much for sharing your positive comments with us which I have gladly passed on. I was so glad to read that we provided exceptional service during your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective departments have been complimented for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: The pictures make the hotel look better than it actually does. Arriving, it looked pretty old and wasn't the best thing to glance at. But that's not the reason I was there so I brushed it off.   I arrived a little early than check in, but enough time after checkout so I kind of expected a room to be ready. It wasn't and the wait wasn't long, but FYI don't come early thinking you'll get a room.   The room was pretty decent, but just a bit old for us. The bathroom showed its age. The tub and tile was yellowish (as if someone was smoking for years). The bed has to be the best thing ever. I think all Hiltons have comfortable beds!   The shuttle was pretty cool to take. 4 mile radius was all we needed and other than that, Lyft was the answer! The people in the hotel lobby and drivers
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback relating to your stay at the Doubletree-Santa Ana, CA.   The comments are insightful and helpful for the hotel team’s goals to improve the service, rooms, and the public areas of the hotel. Please accept our team’s sincere apology for the failures in service that resulted in any inconvenience and lack of comfort. We are very grateful for the choice you made to be a guest of the hotel. We will continue striving to provide a hospitality level that exceeds other available lodging choices.

Summary: Stayed for business for a couple of nights. Hotel was very clean, easy parking, beautiful view of fountain area out front, friendly staff, access to restaurant/bar on site serving food until 10 that was much needed since too far to walk anywhere. Will definitely use this as my go-to hotel when back for business in this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport. It is always a pleasure to read that our guests had a great time. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective departments have been complimented  for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: staff provided excellent service. enjoyed the cookie very much when i arrived for checking in. staff was very polite and helpful. My room was very clean. great breakfast buffet! I would recommend this hotel to my family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review relating to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport. I was so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective departments have been complimented for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: I loved my stay at this DoubleTree. My room was excellent and very clean. I was lucky enough to get a corner suite with a king size bed, so my room was HUGE. Also, the staff was very friendly. One thing that struck me and I'm probably going to remember for a long time is that while I was walking down the hall to my room, I happened to pass one of the cleaning maids. They were busy cleaning one of the other guestrooms, and she saw me and smiled very big and very happily greeted me with a hello. It was a small gesture but just her happy cheerful attitude really cheered me up, as I was feeling stressed at the time. Attitude is KEY! That, along with the other great services and awesome guestrooms really make for a great experience at the DoubleTree.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review relating to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport. I was so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective departments have been complimented for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: THE hotel to stay at for Surf City
Summary: Perfect place to stay the night before a marathon/half marathon.  The Pasta Buffet was perfect for our group.  It was much better than traveling in traffic and waiting in line at a crowded restaurant. The hotel was quiet enough to allow for a good nights sleep.  The 4:30 free breakfast was just right for pre-run fuel and coffee/tea.  The shuttle got us to and from the race without stress.  We really appreciated the late checkout time so we could shower before we started the drive home.  The staff worked hard to give guests the best possible experience. We were very pleased.

My daughter and I have stayed at quite a few hotels throughout California since we started doing half marathons 5 years ago, but we have never experienced such royal treatment. Everything was so organized: the reception upon our arrival with printed notification about our event, the shuttles to and from our event, and the "runners carb" dinner. Upon our return from the event we were greeted in the hotel lobby by the hotel staff cheering us on and clanging pots and pans as if we had won the Boston Marathon. It was exhilarating!!! On the morning of our check out, the hotel and surrounding area had a power failure. Since I was at the registration desk  I witnessed first hand how efficiently everything was handled. The staff quickly made sure no one was stuck in the elevators. As I

I came to run the Surf City Marathon and stayed here since it was a partner hotel.  Service was excellent and it was nice that the hotel provided a special carbo loading meal the night before (not included in cost) and the pre-race breakfast (included in cost).  For marathoners, the breakfast area opened at 4:30 am,  It was a cold breakfast (but still included hot oatmeal) and the shuttle left at 5:30am.  Hotel staff were awesome and I wouldn't hesitate to come back.

We have stayed at DoubleTree Club on two separate occasions.  I think they are one of the friendliest places that I have stayed.  The rooms are clean and the front staff are friendly and helpful.  The warm cookies are a treat.  We are already planning our next trip to Orange County, and will definitely return to this hotel.  Highly recommend to anyone.

We booked a room through Surfcity marathon and we had great experiences with DoubleTree Club. Michelle emailed me 1 week before we came to confirm how many people that need shuttle to the race. I emailed back with some questions and she replied right away. We checked in and booked the shuttles right at the lobby. I got complimentary 2 water bottles and a cookie. When we went to our room, they called us to see if everything was ok. The morning of the race, there was breakfast at 4:30AM with really good choices. The shuttle came to pick us up on time. They also let us check out late. One thing that need improvement was the faucets in our bathrooms are old. They were hard to turn. Overall, it was a very nice stay. We would go back if we run the surfcity marathon again.

I fly out to Orange County every several months for business. This was my first time staying at any Doubleetree property. Everything was great from the point of being picked up by the hotel shuttle driver Eduardo. The guest service agent Navarro was able to get me an early check-in with a beautiful room for my not so short stay. The breakfast was excellent and the dinner menu was even better. I recommend anyone who's traveling to Orange County for business, to stay at this property.

We chose to stay at this hotel because it offered a free shuttle bus ride to and from the Surf City Marathon/Half Marathon.  Michelle did a great job organizing the bus rides and contacting everyone in advanced.  They provided breakfast extra early for the racers.  When we arrived back at the hotel post race we were greeting by numerous staff members cheering for us. We thought it was a very nice touch.  Shortly before we checked out of the hotel the hotel and surrounding area lost power.  The staff was walking up and down the stairwells with flashlights to check on guests.  They were even offering to carry down guest's luggage because the elevators were out of service.  Great customer service!

I use to love the Doubletree when I was younger. Their cookies always and still are lovely for the kids. The hotel was packed for the weekend with the water polo tournament in town. The place was crawling with kids and the staff was super nice to them: giving cookies freely upon request. Being an older adult now, the hallways were dark and uninviting. The staff helped an older couple in wheelchair and walker up to their room. The valet and parking though were overwhelmed by the crowds. The breakfast buffet was standard fare but freshly made. The exercise room was a standard corner room with one treadmill, two ellipticals and free weights. The lake is beautiful with ducks, swans and a fountain. A run around the lake barely makes one kilometer but there are stairs for more of a

Stayed here because it was a cheaper option than surrounding Hilton properties so my expectations were tempered a bit.  Room was adequate, the man made lake view is nice.  Bed was comfy and shower area was pretty normal.  Lobby area is a bit small.  Service personnel are nice and do their best to please.  Breakfast was not up to par to other Doubletree properties in the area unless you like egg mcmuffins.  The pastries were nice and wait staff were nice.  They do charge for parking but they do offer valet.  If you are looking to save a little this is a decent option for you.

Great find and value for money spent!  The location is perfect.  The staff is very customer focused.  The restaurant does a Great job.  Their tortilla soup is homemade and the best I have had anywhere. The wait staff is focused on the customer and happy to accommodate.  I would recommend this hotel and would stay again.

I had stayed many times at the Doubletree Club in years past and truly enjoyed the hotel and its location so when the need arose to stay in the area again it was an easy choice.  The hotel is small which I like, located on a man made lake complete with ducks and has the best parking rate in the area.  Situated between the Orange County Airport and South Coast Plaza and right off the 55; getting around is a breeze.  The staff (and the cookie of course) were wonderful, check in was quick and I love their corner rooms.  I am a finicky sleeper and fell right into a long, restful sleep on their beds!  They have very soft pillows so if that is not your preference please let them know.  Flat screen tvs were only 37" (picky, picky, picky) and options for in room dining were not ideal

very nice close to the airport hotel, the room was big and maintain well. i liked the warm cookie :) i got when i checked in the parking lot was full and was hard to find a parking space, except that it was perfect fit for one night stay.

Summary Heading: One of the Best by John Wayne Airport
Summary: Great service, awesome staff and cleanest rooms.  Walked in late evening.  Greeted by great front desk staff.  Enjoyed dinner in the Bistro bar top.  Great service there as well.  Food was amazing. Service at breakfast was excellent.  Food looked fresh and service team was friendly.

This hotel is great. Clean, I have stayed before and would always go back. The location is great, service is great, the price is good on weekends. Rooms are a good size. The staff is friendly and helpful.

Summary Heading: Great service and stay as always
Summary: Once again a lovely stay at the Double Tree. Iam always pleased with the quality of service I receive here. The rooms are clean and comfortable and the staff is polite and friendly.  And cookies!! I will be returning.

To get to the hotel I've used both, the parking lot and shuttle service. Shuttle service took about 20 minutes to pick me up at the airport; I'll say that's too much being so close to it. Using car, parking space is very limited but there is also Valet parking option. Check in and service in general was good. Rooms are quiet, also relatively small and housekeeping could be improved, specially areas that are not regularly seen, like the interior of the closet or below the desk.  Breakfast buffet was ok.

Facility had several amenities not working.  Staff not very helpful in trying to accommodate reservation extension.  Had to go to another hotel.  Pool and hot tub was not working.  Lunch provided for training seminar was very poor.

Summary Heading: It was just a mediocre hotel.
Summary: I would stay here again only if I had to.   There was a dirty used room service menu they reused or left from the guests before us and was on our pillow when we arrived.  Made me second guess the  cleanliness of the room    Breakfast was $10 a person but not worth it.  The food available was very 'continental breakfast' style.   Also the ac/fan unit in our room was very noisy and rattled all night and they said it was possible broken.

Summary Heading: Rose Parade with Tour Group stay
Summary: As part of a tour, we were very pleasantly surprised by both the hotel in general and our room on the top floor. They won our hearts (or should I say tummies) by offering us Warm Chocolate Chip & walnut cookies upon our arrival. Then treated us each a cookie over the next two days, including the day we left. We also had a sit down dinner our 1st night which was very good. The hotel was especially accommodating on our Parade day, by opening the buffet to our tour group @4:30 am PLUS they had take out boxes & glasses allowing us to take some food on the go or to be eaten later. Overall we were both very happy with our experience. The only problem we had was the 1st set of room keys did not work at all, but a hotel staff saw us trying and let us in. Bonus, was having an elevator to

Clean, welcoming, and perfect location for business goers in Santa Ana. Staff was friendly, breakfast and dinner were tasty and they were able to check me in 4 hours early after and 8 hour flight. Staying here everytime I am in Santa Ana!

Things started off on the wrong foot when the taxi took me to the nearby, but "other" Doubletree a few blocks away.  I then had to get another taxi to take me to this property, which is the "Doubletree Club" (not the Doubletree on E. MacArthur Blvd).  My grumpy mood was compounded by a screw up in my reservation that took some time to resolve.  It was further exacerbated when I got to my "Hilton Honors" room in the "Club" which I mistakenly expected to be something slightly above the usual Hilton average.  In fact the room could as well have been a Holiday Inn.  It was plain and uninviting, and the bathroom was more Motel 6 than Holiday Inn.  There wasn't even a shower cap, just three little bottles of shampoo, conditioner and body lotion, and a cheap bar of soap.  If that was

The staff was efficient and helpful, particularly since we were in a large group (over 50 people).  Check in was extremely fast, the rooms were clean and well-appointed with comfortable beds and decent pillows.    Our only complaint is that the in-room heating/cooling system is very loud and lacks a thermostat, so it's difficult to get a temperature setting that will be comfortable for you.

We had a beautiful suite, very comfortable bed. The staff was responsive to requests. It was close to John Wayne Airport, and shuttle service made it easy to catch our early morning flight. Free breakfast would be nice, but was not included. We were there to visit our son, who came by each day and parked there. We requested waiving the parking fee for his visits, since he rarely stayed for more than an hour or two at a time. I recommend getting a confirmation email if you request that.
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us in regards to your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport.   Thank you so much for sharing your positive comments with us which I have gladly passed on. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective department has been complimented for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: The location of this hotel is very convenient to all of the attractions in Orange County. It's a short drive to the airport, Newport Beach, Disneyland, and South Coast Plaza. The staff is really committed to making sure that you get the best out of your stay.  I accidentally left one of my bags in the lobby and the staff called me to inform me that I had left my bag there, which saved me a lot of problems.  The rooms are clean and the amenities are nice.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone that is looking for a nice welcoming place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to reach out and tell us about your stay at the Doubletree Club Hilton Orange County Airport. Thank you so much for sharing your positive comments with us, which I have gladly passed on. I was so glad to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Your message has been shared with the entire team and the respective department has been complimented for a job well done. The time you have taken along with the effort you have made to share your comments with us is most appreciated. We are looking forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Missed opportunity - threw in the towel
Summary: My trip didn't begin well so you can take this experience with a grain of salt...I got in much later than I expected but still in time for dinner in the restaurant.  The gyro I had was actually quite delicious and although the place was practically empty, service was good and food delivery quick.  It was the next morning that I experienced some difficulty.  When I stepped out of the shower, I discovered that I had no towels at all.  Nada, zip, zilch!  The only thing left was a hand towel.  I managed to dry off, and the staff later apologized and refunded me a nights parking, but it's tough to let go of that experience after a difficult start.  The hotel IS convenient to the airport which made my early departure less stressful and I would stay again if given the chance.

Nice stay. Clean room. Nice front desk attitude very welcome staff. I enjoy my stay during Christmas to visit my Family in Irvine . Nice place to stay in good view to the lake. Great location from 55 -405 close to South 5 Freeways. Nice parking well lighted and safe.

Do not stay here. The rooms have old worn out furniture. But the worst is the sleep you will get in the bed. Somehow associated with the hard pillows they hurt your head and neck from any angle you sleep on them.  You wake up with a headache in the morning from the positioning of your head and neck on the pillows.  The pictures on-line look NOTHING like the actual room.  I've never seen anything out the air and heating unit which seems to suck all the fresh air and of the room, leaving the room extremely humid.

I travel to the Hilton in Santa Ana for work because it is located right next to my company's office.  I generally arrive later in the evening and have found the staff to be friendly.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  I always get a cookie from the front desk which is a nice touch!  The hotel has an onsite restaurant which is not bad and is located next to a commercial building complex with a large water treatment/pond area that has a walking path.  I will stay here again because of the convenience.

Great hotel. Breakfast and host person was super. front desk personal were very nice and made sure we were well taken care off. Only thing is they did not have a hotel store like at other DoubleTree and Hilton brand locations.

This is a great place for families to stay if coming to town for an Angels game or visiting Orange County.  It is conveniently located near the freeway and SNA Airport.  The service staff is great with a nice restaurant to have dinner.  Staff is very friendly and the cookie they give you as you walk out is the icing on the cake.

Decent place to stay for business travel.  Not fancy but comfortable.  Breakfast service is amazing and they serve a decent dinner when you have had a long work or travel day and don't want to venture out.

Summary Heading: I am disappointed by the place
Summary: This was I my first stay to this Double tree but it is not your regular double tree. The room I was allocated was boring and not to what I was expected. The bed was a queen bed, the room was a bit small and the overall facilites were nothing special. They "forcing" in some way to use the valet and if not then still cost you $11.  The restaurant room looked empty and here as well very basic to the point that I skipped dinner and breakfast. The heat air unit was NOISY so i had to switched it off. Next time I need a hotel close to Orange Co airport I will pick somewhere else.

We flew (red-eye)from Kauai to LA and were warmly greeted from the hotel staff.  They allowed us to check in early and rest up before our visit to Disneyland and our Thanksgiving dinner.  The hotel is in a perfect location for shopping too!  The warm cookies were perfect!

My husband and I decided to plan a last minute 5year anniversary getaway. We went to Disneyland and stayed that night on 11/11/16 and Saturday 11/12/16. The front desk was absolutely wonderful! The girl who greeted us was extremely friendly and even gave us a small gift from the hotel due to our special occasion. Our room was clean and had enough space for the two of us.  When ever we called guest services, they would help us right away with any requests or inquiries. Although it is not right next to Disneyland, it is not too far from it and you avoid the crowds and traffic. We recommend staying here!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay but skip breakfast
Summary: Excellent place to stay. Convenient, well maintained, clean, friendly staff, nice outdoor environment. Beautiful walkway around water with cute ducks. Only issue was breakfast. Buffet eggs dry, hash browns mealy  and decaf coffee poor taste and luke warm.

The property is conveniently located and is easily located from 2 major freeways. Everything was what you would expect from the DoubleTree brand. Clean and fresh inside and out. The staff was friendly and very helpful. Look forward to my next stay.

Summary Heading: Great Location near John Wayne Airport
Summary: My coworkers and I travel to Costa Mesa a couple times each year and are never disappointed with this hotel.  It is near everything, always clean, and the staff are very helpful.  The cookies are great and I am always given a bottle of water or two when I check in.  Highly recommend this hotel if you need to stay in this area.

Love the location of this hotel, however we find breakfast staff, food offerings, etc. much weaker than other Doubletree Hotels in the area. not sure what can change within this hotel to rectify this.  Breakfast is always the only meal we eat when at this hotel.

Does not provide the typical Hilton Experience. It is not a full service location and hence you have to collect the water bottles from the front desk. However, the overall experience is fine. You can access to Santa Ana airport easily within ten minutes.

Summary Heading: Terrible in-room air quality and food - will never stay here again
Summary: First, I left this hotel with swollen, irritated, and red eyes due to poor air quality.  There are individual inwall units in the room and it was just horrible.  No other explanation for the issue because as soon as I left, it was  better, then staying in a family home for the rest of my trip to CA, the issue completely went away.    Second the food was horrible in both the restaurant and in room dining.  Thankfully I complained the second day and was given a refund, but the manager, who needs training in client interaction, refused to refund the first day.

It is close to the airport and a shuttle is provide to and from the John Wayne airport. The staff is friendly and the rooms are clean. They give you a free breakfast and the staff in the restaurant is fast, fun, and friendly. The hotel is near a lake that you can walk around. It's very nice.

My family and I have been staying here for years and love this location. My kids feed the ducks and love walking around the beautiful lake. Staff is wonderful and the GM is great. They all go above and beyond to make their guest feel welcomed. The rooms are clean and kept up nicely.

Stayed the night due to the close proximity to my morning meeting. I was surprised at how quiet it was being so close to the airport. I had a great view of the pond which had joggers and ducks making good use of it the next morning. Cookie at check in is a nice touch!

Dirty dishes everywhere upon arrival including used utensils up and down the entire 5th floor Honors floor. Checked in at 3:30pm and it appeared as though dishes were there from previous evening. If hotel management doesn't care about outward appearances, I can only image what is going on behind the curtain. Too bad. This was my go to hotel while on business in OC. Looking for another business stay destination now.

I have traveled a lot in the past year for my previous job, but this hotel had, by far, the friendliest staff I have ever encountered. They were so friendly in fact, I was sad to end my stay because I most likely will never have the chance to travel back and use their amenities. Highly recommend!

Not enough space for guess to park your car.  Should be assigned a parking space since they are numbered.  You are being charged $11/ day for parking even if you have to park on the street.  First time staying in a DoubleTree Club by Hilton.  Above Excellent service and stay.  Thank You

Nice location close to airport and Cosa Mesa and plenty o food options within short drive. Rooms standard for Doubletree. Nice functional gym. Staff was friendly and cookies and waters added to touch.

Hotel staff were friendly. The front desk manager was professional and prompt. My team and I had a great guest experience due to your breakfast staff. He was  accommodating, and thoughtful -- he had terrific customer service.  The rooms and hallway have a distasteful smell, bathrooms and AC are dated.
