Manager Response: Dear ajsbabe,  Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re very sorry that you encountered an unacceptable level of service. We do our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that next time you’re in the area, you’ll visit us again and experience a higher level of customer service. Thank you again for your comments.  Thank you, Sanjay Patel 714-751-2400

Summary: The staff is  friendly and helpful. Breakfast buffet is good, but pretty expensive for what it is. I wouldn't recommend the restaurant for dinner. They have a convenient shuttle service for any location within 4 miles of the hotel - a much appreciated, unexpected perk.

We stayed at this hotel for a two day board meeting for 25 people.  The front desk staff was over the top helpful and friendly.  The word "no" was not part of their vocabulary.  No matter what we needed, they accommodated.  The entire hotel staff was friendly and helpful.  The hotel was immaculately clean.  Ask for a room on the lake, the view is really nice, and the room is quiet.

This hotel is one of the worst I've stayed in in many years. Small, cramped lobby, old, run down rooms, corridors that were dark and smelly, constant noise from the air conditioning system, no restaurant, no ability to open an outside window, two fixtures didn't work, very slippery bathroom floor and no morning newspapers of any kind.  The staff tried their best but were overwhelmed.
Manager Response: Dear Arthur Z,  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We are very sorry you were unhappy with our guestrooms. We appreciate your feedback, and will keep your comments in mind while we work to improve our guest experience. We hope you’ll stay with us again soon and tell us what you think about our improvements.  Thank you,  Sanjay Patel

Summary Heading: Friendly and convenient near OC Airport!
Summary: Our team had reservations at the Double Tree Club as repeat lodgers this past weekend.  The staff is super friendly and goes out of their way to make sure everything goes perfect!  The manager, Lindsey, is so committed to this that I believe she works double shifts to ensure that all is well. Loved the bar/restaurant that opens at 5:00.  Also has very nice staff and T.V.'s to catch up with sports. The outdoor patio is by a lake and a pleasant place to eat your meal or just hang out and visit.  There were issues with the elevators on Sunday, but there were staff on every floor to assist in bringing bags down.  We will stay there again!

The hotel is fine.  Chocolate chip cookies as usual and very tasty.  I was surprised to have to pay for parking.  $11.00 per night.  The hotel has a parking lot and is surrounded by parking garages.  It is in an office park, not in the city.

Looking for a place to stay in Orange County area and found the DoubleTree Club in Santa Ana. This is a Hilton Hotel affiliate which set my expectations higher. Valet parking was the same price as self parking ($11). The front desk staff was very courteous and helpful. The room was on the 4th floor close to the elevator, but quiet. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. There was a small fridge in the room and a coffee maker. We also had complimentary WiFi service. The view we had was of a small lake adjacent to the property. I would recommend this location to anyone wanting to stay at a small, but very nice hotel.

Happy with everything! I was picked up via their free shuttle within 10 minutes of calling to request. The driver was great pointing out restaurants, where to go, and other tidbits of information. Hotel staff was super friendly, from the cleaning staff, to the restaurant, to front desk. Everyone greeted me and was willing to do whatever they could to accommodate my needs. Only suggestion, not price some of the necessities that might have been left at home so high (some hotels even offer these items for free, e.g. tooth brush, tooth paste, etc.

Summary Heading: Great First Hilton Honors Member Experience
Summary: We loved everything about this stay from the front desk service of getting us an early check in to the way we were treated was all first rate.  We loved it and would stay here again if the opportunity presented itself again.

I often stay at this property, but need to reconsider for the future.  I arrived and waited for 5 minutes while the clerk talked to someone on the phone.  Granted, it was a customer and not a personal call, but I could hear people in the office behind her.  No one came out to help, and she did not put the caller on hold to ask for assistance.  You don't make customers stand in line like that.  Not if you want to see them back. The hotel has been remodeling for some time, but the rooms still need more attention.  Their "gift shop" is a wall display with very little to choose for snacks and such.  Lastly, when I went to leave, early in the morning, I had to call out for help because no one was at the desk and no one showed up for 5 minutes.  Time to move on...

Very good service; decent property, quiet location, close to John Wayne International Airport in Orange County.  I very much appreciated the front desk staff upgrading me before I arrived; they were also very helpful in having my car pulled up in the morning while I was having breakfast so I didn't have to wait for it once I was ready to go.

We stayed at this hotel because of the pictures they had online but we were so disappointed when we saw the actual rooms and lobby! It is sorely outdated from the air conditioner (noisy and smelly) to the hallways (dark) to the rooms (considerably smaller than pictures). Doubletree! update this, what could be a cute boutique hotel, to the 2000's.
Manager Response: Dear Johnessie  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We are very sorry you were unhappy with our guestrooms. We appreciate your feedback, and will keep your comments in mind while we work to improve our guest experience. We hope you’ll stay with us again soon and tell us what you think about our improvements.  Thank you,  Michelle Van Winkle Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Clean and Friendly Mecca in the city
Summary: My entire stay from check in to check out, I don't think I saw one employee frown. The staff was incredibly friendly, and although the parking lot is quite tight for a full sized pickup, the Valet staff treated me and my vehicle with the utmost care. The room was clean, and quiet, all appliances worked per design. The housekeeping staff kept me in coffee, and my room exceptionally clean and crisp. The breakfast coupons provided, made for a great, no cost start to the day. I will be staying here again.

The staff of this hotel are friendly and will go out of their way to assist you.  The hotel had computer issues and could not issue keys but the staff made sure that getting in and out of your room easy. Good location for business or pleasure.  Great value for the price paid.

Being a Hilton Honors Member got me no where when it comes to checking in early. It fell upon deaf ears! Had to wait over two hours for my room. Unacceptable. As soon as we got off the elevator that took forever to arrive considering there are only six floors, the smell hit us. It smelled like a musty wet basement and the room was even worse! The lighting in the hallway and rooms are not very well lit. Everything is outdated. The so called vent in the bathroom (near the toilet) was ceramic and it fell off by itself! Thank goodness nobody was in there. The hole it fell from looked like it had mold, dust and dirt around it and up in the hole. The air conditioner had to run all the time because the smell in the room would come back and you can't open the windows. The breakfasts are
Manager Response: Dear Colleen B,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry for the issues that you experienced with your room during your stay. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.   Thank you, Sanjay Patel

Summary Heading: Everything you need, with nearby Starbucks
Summary: This was our second stay at this hotel. We booked this hotel on the weekend last minute and got a Queen bedroom with no view. The rooms facing the lake are bigger and air quality is better - we recommend those rooms. Our room was small, but had every amenity we needed. No water pressure quirks this time around, unlike our previous stay. Water pressure was excellent. The pillows were still noticeably quite flat, but they didn't bother me as much this time around for some reason. I guess I was just so sleepy.  Breakfast was just okay. They served ham, scrambled eggs, potatoes, and toast, but I wouldn't call them delicious. Wish they served bacon. Decent enough for the budget traveler though. There are other great restaurants nearby.  You gotta love the free parking, although when

As a Hilton Diamond, this Double Tree Hotel does an outstanding job. It's 5 minutes from John Wayne Airport with free shuttle service. The rooms are well decorated, clean and the beds are very comfortable. Great place for any business traveler. Nice reflective pond in the front of the hotel to either walk around or sit outside during morning coffee or evening cocktail. The staff were extremely friendly and made me feel quite welcome. I highly recommend this hotel.

We stayed over the Labor Day long weekend as part of a soccer tournament.  The service was consistently horrendous whether it was catering or an obnoxious and poorly trained night manager.  Find other alternatives!
Manager Response: Dear Katherine T,  We’re sorry we didn’t provide the high quality of services you deserve. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we have addressed the issues you mentioned. We try to make each guest experience a great one at our hotel as your satisfaction is important to us. Thank you again for your feedback.  Thank you, Sanjay Patel

Summary: Staff and ammenities made this a perfect spot to enjoy our  soccer tournament!  Coming from Phoenix Arizona we arrived late and our cookies were warm just waiting for us.  There was an abundance of carts to help us carry our gear and suitcases to our room.  Great JOB!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel / Food Services not so good
Summary: The staff at the hotel end were great. Food services not so good. If you have a big party and want to do a banquet style not sure this is the best place.  Double tree does a great job usually. Very disappointed.

Stayed here with a group of friends.  Great location, great service, excellent food, shuttle service was very helpful. Enjoyed the delicious cookies they handed out.  Enjoyed the terrace area alongside the small lake.

Stayed here for a wedding. Had no problems with this stay!  Even had free shuttle to the airport.  Love the free cookies and the staff were very nice and accommodating! The rooms were clean and had everything that I needed.  Make sure you book at the 7 Hutton double tree.  There is another down the street.

Summary Heading: Lovely little Hotel near Orange County Fair
Summary: We stayed here to go to the OC Fair, last year and this year. It was the perfect location. They shuttled us to the fair and picked us up when we were ready to leave. The hotel is on a nice little lake. We ordered wine from the bar and sat out at the lake feeding the various types of ducks and geese with food that you could buy at the lakeside. The room was pleasant and the staff very accommodating. We will stay definitely there again for the fair next year!

This hotel is near the Orange County/John Wayne airport. It's has several restaurants and coffee shops within walking distance as well. Staff was friendly and hotel room was very clean. I have stayed here several times and will continue to choose this hotel.

We felt frequent trembles in the room. We were told the trembling comes from the laundry room and it could be felt up to the sixth floor. Also, the elevators were not functioning at some point during our stay and we had to take the stairs.

A nice place by the airport, still very was quite, have some restaurants like a sushi place, Thai place, and a Starbucks (which I always need). There a lake with tables that you could relax too. Over all a really great place.

Great experience started from the Valet Parking even thought we checked in late, they were energetic and with great spirit, also the check in process was fast especially with two young kids, THE COOKIES WERE AWESOME !!! Make sure to ask for the lake view, it was great. Wife approval !!!

Summary Heading: Nice setting in an urban area
Summary: This hotel is located on a small man made lake/pond in a business park and residential area.  Very pleasant surrounding for a hotel in Orange County. A modern Scandinavian motif that does have a few miles on it but still pleasant.  The rooms were nicely appointed- very comfortable bed and also very quiet.   The valet staff were very friendly and helpful as was the front desk personnel. They set a comfortable yet professional tone that makes you appreciate a well trained customer service staff. The breakfast was above average. Excellent location between the 405 and 55 freeways- easy in and out.   The staff was the tipping point for me to give this hotel a 4 rating.

The property is close to airport, great shuttle service, great staff, clean and comfortable room and good wifi service - definitely recommend.  Excellent buffet breakfast in the lobby restaurant as well.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Near John Wayne Airport
Summary: Checked in for one night before flight back home the next day.  The front desk provided excellent service at check in and check out.  Cookies were a nice touch.  Room was quiet, well furnished and extremely clean.  Bed was comfortable and housekeeping was very accommodating in providing extra pillows.  Valet parking was an added bonus.  This hotel is located near many nice restaurants so we had no trouble enjoying our last dinner in CA.  Stay here.  Great value.

Rooms and facilities are a bit long in the tooth but overall it is a good property.  Mattresses are bit lumpy but rooms are clean.  Doors to rooms are hard to shut properly or quietly, often sticking open. Staff is friendly but not over the top friendly. Decent rates for a business traveler to this area.  Breakfast items on the buffet could be cooked a bit more, bacon and sausage appeared to be sitting around too long.

want a great hotel, helpful staff & clean, secure location? This is the place! Minutes from Disneyland, Angel  Stadium,great shopping ,beaches and more. Plus easy access to and from the freeways. Get the lake view for a nice tranquil vibe; you will not be disappointed.

I chose this hotel because of its location.  The hotel did not look like the property I saw on the website. I had checked in online but when I arrived the front desk did not show that I had done so.  The staff is friendly.  The air conditioning unit is loud so we kept in on during the day while we were out and turn it off at night so we could sleep.  Good thing the weather was good.

Stayed four days at this hotel.  Great experience.  Rooms were nice, clean and staff welcoming.  Breakfast included.  Nice outdoor eating area lakeside. This hotel is within easy reach of restaurants, and other attractions in the Santa Ana area.

We were celebrating 10 Years Wedding Anniversary, and choose to stay at this romantic hotel. The hotel is very nice, the staff was amazing, they decorated our room with roses, rose petals, and gave us a card to wish us happiness.  This hotel is not far from the beach, which was very nice for us. In the evening we were walking around this pretty lake. Other thing we really liked was that check out is at 12 noon so we could sleep in.  I would like to say thank you so very much for making us feel so special. When we`ll go on another trip to Santa Anna, we will definitely choose this hotel again :)

Summary Heading: Older property with some newer features
Summary: Stayed one night . Checkin was fast, and the staff seemed pleasant. Rooms and floors looked good, remodeled a few years ago. Windows did'nt open, so the room smelled stale. You can tell its an old place with the doors about an inch short of the floor,old ratty frame, that rattles and the bathroom was touched up, but old shower had 1980s tile. Overall clean. Bar downstairs is tiny. We had 2 free cocktail vouchers and the bartendar was pleasant. English does appear to be the second language of the entire staff, however. Language barriers were evident.

The hotel is a bit expensive for the quality of service. The dinning room was not friendly or efficient. Extra charges for parking. It is in a good location and the front desk and parking staff helpful.

Hotel had several problems with elevators, and valet. 3 hour wait to get luggage to room due elevator failure.  Only one elevator all 4 days.  Valet parking was not manned all the time and had to go to desk to get service.

Summary Heading: One weekend night at the Santa Ana Doubletree Club
Summary: Recently stayed a night at the SNA Doubletree Club and was pleasantly surprised by the affordable rate, the beautiful lake front location and of all the things a very helpful staff from the Valet to the front desk and the management. It made the whole experience a pleasure.

Summary Heading: Great staff - minor inconveniences during stay
Summary: Stayed 3 nights on a recent business trip. Location is at the junction of the 405 and 55 freeways, If you are outside it is noisy. Lakeview rooms are advised. All staff from the front desk to housekeeping to valets are exceptionally friendly and polite.   During my stay both elevators were out of service one evening and everyone was forced to use the stairs.   The hotel is also a conference center and hosts a lot of individuals that are not guests at the hotel. Parking is a NIGHTMARE due to this fact - note self serve parking is NON-EXSISTANT. Fee is $11 for self parking and $11 for Valet - if you want your car parked go with the valet option.   Air condition blows but does not do very well at cooling the room down.   Breakfast option is a great deal and definitely recommend.

Summary Heading: Nice but lots of extra charges
Summary: Nice place, great location. The patio overlooking the small lake was a great place to enjoy a long meal.  Room was spacious and quiet, but I didn't like having to pay extra for internet in my room.  Also, the bathroom could use some sort of fan or ventilation.

We booked in this hotel for one night because we had a flight the next morning, this hotel is extremely close to John Wayne airport (SNA). We took a room in the second floor  the room was clean but old. There was a strange noise coming from outside, however we informed the front desk about it and they immediately took action and informed the manager who came to see us. The staff is very helpful and responsive. The hotel offered free coffee (in the room), bottled water and cookies (upon check in).

We spent one night at the Double Tree Club by Hilton. It had a nice little lake with ducks and that was the best part of the hotel. Inside the hotel was a little worn out but our view of the lake made it all ok. However the next morning we went to the breakfast buffet. It was probably the worst buffet we have ever been to. It didn't have a lot of selection, the eggs were gray and the hot water for my tea tasted like coffee.

Awesome hotel stay. No underground parking - yeah! Offer valet parking or self - love it. I stayed at this hotel on business & had to leave early in the morning - 3:00. Loved that they had security in the hotel lobby. Air conditioning worked great :)

We love this DoubleTree! Our family has been staying here for years. We are unable to take long vacations due to our sons medical needs but its so nice to relax for a few days. The rooms are always clean and service is great. The general manager Sanjay was very helpful and made our last stay special. Perfect location for airport access without the ugly view.

I recently stayed here for a night while on a business trip.  The hotel is fine for work, but is in need of renovation.  The room was small, but clean.  The bathroom was dated, and the bathtub/shower was in desperate need of replacement.  The rooms had new Hilton beds, but beyond that, there wasn't much there to rave about.  It serves its purpose with a convenient location.

Summary Heading: Broken Elevators, Leaky ceiling, forced room switches
Summary: A group of us stayed at this hotel for a wedding in Newport Beach. The majority of us were not so pleased with our stay. Here were a few issues: 1) broken elevators. one was completely out of service, the other you had to call down to the front desk to get them to send it up to you when you wanted to come down. 2) our ceiling was leaking horribly by the window. The room above us must have been using their ac, so by our window their was water all over. My mom had laid out her jewelry there too. They sent someone up with towels, but couldn't do anything further to fix or resolve 3) someone else staying there in our group had been placed in a room, and then forced to move after one night to another room. highly inconvenient 4) none of the safes were in working order for anyone in
Manager Response: Dear kaps233,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry for the issues that you encountered with your room. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.   Sincerely,  Sanjay Patel

Summary: This hotel is near the John Wayne Airport. It's quiet and comfortable. The pool area is adjacent to the highway, and it's very hard to hear anyone speak. The breakfast is not included for all guests and is quite expensive for what it is. You pay for parking, a little more if you valet, but $11 for self parking--and it's not necessary to charge when the lot isn't full and there's no garage. However, if you are flying in to work for a week, it is convenient to many of the businesses in the area, you can walk about a block along the small man-made lake/pond with its ducks and turtles to a small strip mall of about five or six different casual dining restaurants, and the rooms themselves are nice--we had a standard room. The staff was fine and when we had trouble with our tub,

This hotel is in a great location and with plenty of open space to catch your breath.  There is a nice pond out front and a jogging path as well.  The restaurant was excellent and the staff was exemplary.  I will be staying at this location again on my next trip to SoCal.

Summary Heading: Not a doubletree product - needs updated
Summary: Hotel is very dated, especially the guest rooms in comparison to other hotels in the area.  I ate in the restaurant for breakfast - the food is good, but they didn't have all items on the menu available.  The service from the employees at the hotel was excellent.  Its too bad they have such a run down hotel to work in.
Manager Response: Dear Brent L,  Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.   Sincerely, Sanjay Patel

Summary: Great access to all of the things we wanted to do in Orange County. The lake view option was very nice and relaxing to look at through our window. The only thing that would have made this even better would have been complimentary parking.

If you like a room desperately in need of updating, that's dark & tired, broken elevators with wait times of 15 minutes + resulting in long flights of stairs and terrible, spongy pillows and finding dirty dishes outside your room upon check in, this might be for you.
Manager Response: Dear Pete F,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry for the issues that you encountered with your room. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.  Sincerely, Sanjay Patel

Summary: During our vacation we were blessed with staying at the Double Tree in Santa Ana Ca. near the airport.  It was a great experience, they staff was awesome and so very helpful.  The rooms and entire facility was immaculate and the dinner we had in the restaurant was fabulous and our waiter Julio was absolutely great.

Summary Heading: More Fair than Poor but better options
Summary: The Doubletree Club is near John Wayne airport in Santa Ana.  The staff was nice and no complaints there.  The hotel is aging.  The room was less than average ... I can't stand those wall unit A/C units in full service hotels.  Noisy and for the price you should get better.  Rest of the room was OK.  Breakfast in the AM was barely fair.  It was a buffet but you got just what was on the bar and no wait service (I think wait service exists for menu ordering).  I would choose a different hotel in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area. Sincerely, Kara Kellogg

Summary: The hotel itself is ok.  It's a big dated.  There are several fast food places within walking distance for snacks.  The internet is horrible.  During speed tests it gets 2Mbps but when actually doing things it was just a mere 200Kbps which made streaming any kind of video difficult.  There is a free shuttle to disneyland is cool. All the service staff were extremely helpful and nice.

The location is good to the airport but it needs a refresh. The location was good and there are a lot of eats close by and some night life.  Parking is a bear but Valet is the same price so you do not have to deal with it.  Could be a 4+ if the update the facility.

My A/C didn't work, the maintenance guy came and turned the air up...didn't try to tinker with it, just said give it some time. I ended up moving after sweating all night when I came back in from exploring the area. Had to call twice (one of which was my husband from FL calling to complain) about having my deadbolt repaired and having the microwave moved from my old room. Found a dirty sock in my bed which led me to question if my sheets were clean...housekeeping came to change them at 10:30pm. Needless to say I went to presentation and conference very sleepy, because I was so concerned about germs from the dirty sheets. Efforts were made to rectify the situation and I applaud them for that, but it was too little too late in many regards.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry for the issues that you experienced with your room during your stay. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. Making sure our guests have a great stay is our top priority. We hope you will consider giving us another try to make it right. Sincerely, Kara Kellogg

Summary: Staff was great! Leroy at the front desk was really sweet to my nieces and went out of his way to make us feel comfortable. Rooms were clean. Prices were good. Close to the airport and not too far from Disney Land.

Summary Heading: Just What We Needed In Orange County CA
Summary: Our first time at this hotel.  Perfect location on a lake in a metropolitan area.  Friendly registration staff.  Our room was not ready upon arrival, but the staff jumped on it very quickly and offered us free breakfast buffet coupons.  The room was very nice, clean and comfortable.  Self parking at $11.00 per night was reasonable.  The breakfast buffet was good.  While the rooms do not have open space or balconies, we did use the lakeside park and patios.  It was very relaxing.  We will return to this hotel. It was a quiet and tranquil retreat in the heart of the major hub-bub of Orange County. Excellent price on Hilton.com.  Nice Job Double Tree Club!

Summary Heading: Superior to some of the hotels in the area.
Summary: I stayed at a certain hotel last time, which was next to the double tree and it was awful. I decided to give double tree a try. It was terrific. Loved the cookie! Loved the breakfast! Overall a very good hotel and I would highly recommend it.

Their breakfast is still tops and the service is excpetional. Scott was great along with the rest of the staff. It's an awesome location with a Starbucks across the street. I continue to come here although our office moved several miles away because it's still very convenient. Thanks Doubletree.

Excellent hotel.  The room was very quiet and beautiful overlooking the lake.  I would definitely recommend this hotel even though it is sort of old.  Great location with easy parking in and out.  Also close to many great restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great 5 Star review. We are glad to hear that that you enjoyed your stay at our property. We feel our lakeside location and walking path is something special for our guests to enjoy. We hope to see you back in future when coming to Orange County. Kara Kellogg

Summary Heading: Only because our meeting was here
Summary: I like Double Tree's, but this one is in need of refreshing.  The AC didn't work fully, never did get the room comfortable and the windows don't open, so it was uncomfortable.  Another downside of the windows not opening is someone had smoked in the room and I could not air it out.  Funny, because they make it clean they will charge you if you smoke in the room.  Guess that is just a threat of for money in their pocket as they don't use it to freshen the room.  The room was not comfortable, especially the bed.  And it was noisier than expected.  Ate and had drinks in the lounge.  The staff is friendly, but the food was just ok.    ----  TIP  if you do stay here and use their shuttle be careful to get on the right one.  They are not the only Double Tree OC in the area.  Make sure
Manager Response: We’re sorry we didn’t provide the high quality of services you expected. This is not typical of our guests experience. We have addressed the issues you mentioned. We try to make each guest experience a great one at our hotel as your satisfaction is important to us. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you’ll give us another opportunity to make it right.  Regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary Heading: Well sized rooms but swimming pool adjacent to highway
Summary: Smaller doubletree property located on a small lake in the middle of Santa Ana, a step away from the airport (shuttle provided). The staff are really nice and I appreciated a call to my room to ensure the room and all else is to my satisfaction from Alex at the front desk. Views of the lake are very nice, but if you get a corner room you might be slightly bothered by the highway noise. Swimming pool and hot tub are outdoors, on the ground floor in a nice area but again the highway is about 20 feet away, so no relaxing quietness. Breakfast was below average for a doubletree property - very small choice and no proactive staff looking after the guests.

The property is nice but aging a bit - elevators are very slow - door to room continued to stick when opening from the outside, the air conditioning worked well but was noisy...  Minor inconveniences.  The staff was very courteous.   Nice place to stay for the price.

stayed here for two nights 27/28 th may....last stop on our Route 66 journey, not impressed, stayed at 12 other hotels on our trip and these were the only ones to charge for parking at $11 a night,,,,,why ??????, it is forty miles from the beach and they only charge $8 a day for parking, room was tiny and bed very small, was not queen size as described, used the pool which was ok but very noisy at it was roadside, ,. There is better around for the money and if you are flying from lax airport then beware its 48 miles away and can take 2 hours
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary: It's a beautiful setting with the pond and the ducks right out front. Orange isn't far,  we drove there for a nice dinner.  The hotel met my expectations,  all was good,  and I liked having all the places to eat such a close walk.

Summary Heading: Diamond Member's Lowest Hilton Property Review
Summary: I made a reservation at this property due to the fact that I was attending a performance at the nearby Segerstrom Center for the Arts on a Saturday evening.  I was very surprised by the poor quality of the facilities, the weekend groups who had booked the majority of the property and the inedible food served at the breakfast buffet.  I do understand that the nature of a hotel is dominated by groups who stay onsite.  This weekend, the property has scrapbookers who were on a 24+ hour marathon binge and adult softball leagues.  The scrapbookers did not really bother patrons, but the 'overserved' softball leagues made me head to my room as arguments started breaking out in the lobby and hotel bar.  I am also disappointed that the hotel and HHonors cannot seem to work together to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We sincerely apologize for the unacceptable level of service that you experienced. We try our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay, and we are very sorry that we did not achieve that. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff to continually improve our guest experience. We are pleased that we were able to speak and come to a solution. I hope next time you’re in the area, you’ll visit us again so we can deliver a higher level of customer service. Sincerely, Kara Kellogg

Summary Heading: Convenient, clean, great grounds and welcoming staff
Summary: You get your chocolate chip cookies, feed the ducks and enjoy a comfortable room. Wi-fi is free to Hilton Honors members.  During my stay the evening weather was perfect for sitting outside and enjoying the wonderful lake type amenity.  Lunch was also enjoyable by the water feature.  The on-site restaurant staff was very friendly and the food and service were all very good.

Front desk personnel are friendly and very knowledgeable of the local area and who doesn't like getting a warm cookie on check-in? Great location close to airport and despite being close to a major highway, the room was very quiet. Nice park-like setting, and decent restaurants nearby. I'll be back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and our lakeside setting. We hope to see you back on your next trip to Orange County. Regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary Heading: Great Pictures of the Outside ....That's It
Summary: This property is a joke.  It needs a serious updated.  Amenities are sparse.  Food is way overpriced for what you receive.  Rooms smell like mold.  Shower head is very short (I'm 5'11 for perspective).  WIFI is weak.  After one night I asked myself "why am I here?"
Manager Response: Dear simeonb889,  We’re sorry we didn’t provide the high quality of services you deserve. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we have addressed the issues you mentioned. We try to make each guest experience a great one at our hotel as your satisfaction is important to us. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you’ll give us another opportunity to make it right.  Thank you, Kara Kellogg

Summary: From arrival to departure the service and accommodations were outstanding. I was particularly impressed by the registration desk employee on arrival and throughout my stay. He was consistently helpful and a delight to interact with. Hotel accommodations and dining experiences were awesome. The room was exceptional. Housekeeping staff were flexible. So much to stay but did not want to exaggerate the visit.

Alexander is the prefect example of great customer service he was very pleasant to talk to. housekeeping maintains the rooms to a very high standard was nice after a long drive from new mexico. Thanks for the great experience.

Summary Heading: Great staff - from valets to breakfast hosts
Summary: This hotel is set on a small manmade lake in the midst of a semi industrial area.     There were numerous families there over the weekend, competing in softball/baseball tournaments.   The staff at the hotel were very helpful and accommodating to small children and families.   The breakfast buffet was excellent, and the rooms comfortable and quiet.   All good!!

Not only is this hotel set in a beautiful location right on a small lake in a business area but the staff here go out of their way to welcome you and make your stay enjoyable.   Everything from recommending great restaurants to shuttling you around (within a five mile radius)- you will enjoy the hospitality they show here.   Orlando on the dining room morning shift and Julio on the dining room evening shift will personally start and end your day with a smile.

Excellent staff and clean hotel. Very peaceful and pleasant breakfast by the lake. Room was quiet and comfortable. Close by major road and easy access with good parking available, just a shame the parking is chargeable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post such a great review! We are pleased that you enjoyed all  our property has to offer, from our staff to breakfast by the lake. With limited parking in the area, we do our best to manage our lot and keep the parking costs on the low end for the area. We hope to see you back on your next visit to Orange County. Regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary: We stayed 3 nights and enjoyed the hotel so we decided to stay an extra night even though the rate was higher @ $150 , we were out and about the next day and running short on time to be at a family dinner when I needed to go back to the hotel to grab something quickly , I got up to our room only to find out our key card was no longer working so I used the phone by the elevators to call and a girl said she would send someone right up since I was In a hurry 10 mins went by and no one came so I called again and a man answered and said he was sorry and would run it up 15 mins go by and still no one came , I went back down the elevator and got it myself , SUCH A WASTE OF MY TIME , I was so angry but got over it and was late to dinner , afterwards we for back to the hotel at 11pm and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We sincerely apologize for the unacceptable level of service that you experienced. We try our best to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay, and we are very sorry that we did not achieve that. We’ve addressed these issues with our staff and hope that next time you’re in the area, you’ll visit us again so we can deliver a higher level of customer service. Please give us the opportunity to “Make it Right” Please feel free to contact me directly if you return. Kara.kellogg@hilton.com  Sincerely, Kara Kellogg

Summary: This double tree was a pleasurable experience. Great area and located close to our events for our weekend. Staff was friendly and very helpful. Great customer service. Beautiful pond near the Hotel. Sunday breakfast was good especially with the large amount of guests on Sunday morning.

Exceptional staff! From top to bottom, service was excellent! I love that! This normally comes from the top, so thumbs up to the management. Everything else was in line. Rooms were clean and the location easily accesses both the 55 and the 405.

I'm somewhat handicapped, using a cane and gettiing around somewhat slowly and painfully, so I was thrilled by the service from valet Donnel to reception crew to Marilu in bar/restaurant.  They were so friendly and helpful and anticipated possible problems.  Room was great, quiet, good bed, a/c that didn't freeze you out,  refrigerator and a desk that was useful.. Food was great, both the dinner (chicken caesar salad) and the buffet breakfast, giving me ample non-carb choices and great coffee in a mug of a decent size.  The bar, though small, was full to capacity because of Marilu's great personality and skill as a bartender, remembering my preferences and retrieving my cane which kept falling.  I was glad I took the corporate package which included the valet service, free drink

Love how everyone makes you feel very much at home! I stay at this hotel once a month.  I love the view of the lake and the intimate size of the hotel.  In OC, where there are dozens of hotels, this is a true gem.

Only Gold HHonors this year and still received a great corner room and complimentary breakfast. The exercise room was small but nice. The buffet was limited but hot and fresh. The hotel staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Doubletree Club at Orange County sucks
Summary: I booked a room at this hotel for 4 nights for full rates... no discounts or point based booking... After i reached here, first thing i noticed is a big spider in my bathtub... so i thought may be it night have came in (being the 1st level) so i flushed it down.. Next night i see a 3 inch long insect again.. i complained to the front desk who just apologized and did nothing.. the 3rd night i see another spider... i clicked a snap and went to the front desk again... and all they do is apologize.. not interested at all in fixing the issue...  Another issue was internet... For a  hotel which takes prides in calling itself a business hotel, my wifi password did not work... i asked the front desk again and all they did was apologize and said sometimes the internet does not work at
Manager Response: I want to apologize for the unfortunate experience that you had at our hotel. The comfort and safety of our guests is the focal point of our operations in order to continue providing our guests with a great experience. We work closely with a professional pest control company to address any issues that might occur. We will take your additional comments about our property and service under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We are sorry your stay did not meet your expectations and hope you will consider giving us another opportunity.   Thank you, Kara Kellogg

Summary: Hotel was exactly what I expected from a Double Tree.   Clean, well equipt, good restaurant.   Breakfast was good and reasonably priced.  Lots to do around the hotel, good restaurants and malls.  I travel a lot for business and this hotel was what I expected.   The fitness center was the only bad thing:  small and hardly any equipment.

I was in Orange County for business and booked a stay at this hotel because the other hotels in the area were full. I was pleasantly surprised by the entire experience. The location was perfect for me, being close to freeway access, and centrally located for my needs.  The service was excellent and room was well appointed, clean, and comfortable (I really like the beds at the DoubleTree hotels!). They have a nice lake in front of the hotel that allows for a short peaceful walk after a long day at the office or an even longer day in traffic.   I would certainly stay at this hotel in the future if I need to be in the area.

Summary Heading: Rooms okay, Location very good, Customer service THE BEST.
Summary: Small hotel with very friendly front desk at a very good business location. I stayed here twice and will keep coming back for as long as Nicole works at the front desk. Very caring and helpful. She made me feel I was returning home from work.

Summary Heading: My Stay at the Double Tree Club Hotel
Summary: This was my third say at the hotel which as always I found to be excellent in its service and hospitality. I refer all my friends to this facility which they report is the best in Santa Ana. May the hotel and its staff continue to make each quests feel special and worth serving.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write a 5 Star review regarding your recent stay with us. I will be sharing your great comments with all our staff. Making our guests feel welcome and special is what we strive for. We hope to see you back soon! Sincerely, Kara Kellogg

Summary: I'm not really sure why they call it the Doubletree "Club" nor why they consistently charge more than the Doubletree across the street.  It seemed like a bit older of a model. Still nice, but not as nice.  Front desk service was really friendly, love the warm cookies at check-in.  Bed was decent, slept well.   Quick overnight trip, so I didn't get to check out much else.

Pretty clean, overall satisfied. I liked this hotel, even though it was slightly expensive. Liked that it had complimentary breakfast. Might come in the future to stay in LA. Bathroom was clean, and the bed was pretty comfortable.

Our 1 night stay was based on a club reservation for my sons water polo team.  Double Tree was clean, hotel staff was friendly and the bed was comfortable.  I do not recommend the breakfast.  The best part is that it was conveniently located between the schools we had to travel to.  Our overall experience was nice as their was a nice garden area for the parents to socialize in and the boys had a great time hanging around the pool area.

Good business hotel, in a central location with affordable parking. Parking is valet at the same price, which is a bonus. They also have complimentary shuttle service. You can actually swim laps in their pool. Lindsey at the front desk was great and handled any issue which came up. Very affordable and comfortable business trip.

Spent two sleep-free nights in one of the most uncomfortable beds I have ever experienced.  The A/C never worked in our room, nor in the fitness center, so forget working out unless you fear no mold in your lungs.  Not I. We walked to our 3rd floor room as the elevators worked erratically at best. The free breakfast was most unappetizing.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the issues that you experienced during your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience.  We hope you will consider giving us another try to make it right.   Thank you, Kara Kellogg

Summary: This place is suited for teenagers playing sport games and it works - pool, lots of food at breakfast and kids can be themselves. There was a little too much disinfectant in my room that smelled awful with little circulation. Staff extremely friendly and accommodating. Internet costs ten bucks a day which feels like a rip-off.

All the staff at the Double Tree were wonderful and couldn't have been more helpful - from check-in to the staff who drove the free shuttle (to South Coast Plaza).  The hotel really exceeded my expectations.  Rooms were very clean and the beds very comfortable.  Large windows overlook  a lake - which you can also go and sit by.  The pool area catches the sun and was a good, relaxing place to spend a couple of hours.  Free wifi and a good breakfast menu also made this a really great place to stay at.

The service I received at the Double Tree Club was excellent.  I was greeted at the check-in counter by Garrison (I hope I spelled his name right).  He made it super comfortable and simple to check in, especially since I has spent the whole day at a training seminar.  My room was nice - I enjoy big windows with natural light coming through, so it made for an enjoyable stay.  Will be coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review! We are pleased to hear that you had such a great stay with us and for  the nice comments about Garrison. We will definitely be sharing them with him and our staff.  We hope to see you back the next time you are in the Orange County area. Best regards, Kara Kellogg Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Just a wonderful place.  Great service, nice room, wonderful location
Summary: A quick shuttle ride from the airport makes this a great choice when flying into or out of Orange County/John Wayne Airport.  The hotel itself is well maintained and is located on the edge of a nice little lake.  The outside seating and shuttle fro local dining etc. makes it a great place.  There is a bar and restaurant in the hotel, but many local choices and the free shuttle make dining out a pleasure.  Breakfast was Doubletree standard fare.  Good stuff if included with your rate.  A nice pool and hot tub are located on the side of the hotel and often go unnoticed.  I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great 5 star review! We are pleased that you enjoyed our lakeside location. We think we have the perfect spot to relax after a busy day. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your return. Sincerely, Kara Kellogg

Summary: I stayed here one night before switching to my conference hotel.  Everything was great from check-in (where I was given I nice package of bottles of water and extra cookies as a Hilton Honors member), to my stay in the very clean, comfortable room.  This is a great location in relation to the airport and the beaches.  There is a Doubletree nearby which can be confusing, but overall this was an excellent stay.

My stay couldn't have been better. The room was clean, spacious and with a lot of sunlight. However, the most memorable part was the customer service. The staff was professional yet very friendly. They offered me cookie at check in which i resisted at first but finally gave in. They were truly delicious and i recommend everyone try them! The shuttle drivers were familiar with the area and helped me get around. A special note of gratitude is due to Nicole at the front desk who helped me on multiple occasions especially when i broke my phone charger and she was able to find me one to use at short notice ! Thank you all for a wonderful stay

I enjoyed my stay at this particular DoubleTree location.  It was a great value and breakfast was very good.  The room was ok, nothing special.  Sleep quality was very good as the room was dark and quiet.  I didn't like having to pay for parking but I would stay here again if I was in the area again.

Summary Heading: nice suite, great airport location, eat and drink elsewhere
Summary: There is another DoubleTree nearby.  This applies to the DoubleTree Club.  I cannot address the other property.    Check in, bellman, and valet service excellent. Excellent value. I received a very inexpensive upgrade to a nice suite. VERY convenient to the airport.  The hotel side of this property is highly recommended.  However...  The restaurant appears to be an afterthought.  Very limited wine selection.  I ordered my "no way they can screw it up" choice, a club sandwich.  My companion ordered a hamburger.  Both were very disappointing.   Stay here, eat elsewhere.

I had an incredible stay at the Doubletree near the Santa Ana John Wayne Airport.  The shuttle bus driver was super friendly and everyone behind the counter in the lobby was terrific.  Customer service was top notch!  There is a beautiful lake with walking trails just outside the lobby area that is wonderful for exercising.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay - good service
Summary: I am here for business.  Things that impress me right away are quick check-in.  They didn't need my credit card or license because I did the e-check in on the Hilton app.  The process took me no more than a minute and I had my room keys.  Over the phone I inquired if some features were in my room and they weren't - they helped me switch to a room with the amenities that I needed - excellent   I wasn't feeling well on the trip- they gave me crackers and some fruit free of charge, as well as an extra water- made this place feel more like a boutique hotel and less like a big Hilton where rules are rules.    Left two nights early due to illness- no problem and no extra charges.    When I am in Santa Ana- this is my hotel of choice.

Summary Heading: Desk Staff needs to be empower to handle guest situations better
Summary: At check in they did not have my room type. I was given a lesser type than I reserved. It had a very loud fridge and the entire room vibrated all night due to something, maybe HVAC unit in the next room or something on the roof... Next day I was able to get into my room type. I asked for a reduced rate at check out for that first night.. The offered me $13.00, what a joke! The F&B staff was tremendous!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry for the issues that you experienced with your room during your stay. We will take your comments under consideration and use as an example in our customer service trainings. We are continually working to improve our guests experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future. Please contact me directly and I will make sure your stay is a great one. Regards, Kara Kellogg Kara.kellogg@hilton.com

Summary: Very close to the John Wayne airport.  The staff at checkin was great.  Who doesn't like warm cookies?  Room was nice.  The bed and pillows were very comfortable. Their valet staff was very friendly.  They shuttled us to a local restaurant (Habana-excellent). The bar restaurant at the hotel was ok. Too bright and the menu was boring.  Bar staff was nice.  We had one drink.  Definitely will come back here.  Price is good and they shuttle to the airport.

The location is very convenient, and you can't beat the staff and amenities! Their breakfast is better than most, and if you are a Hilton Honors member, get ready for the royalty treatment! This is one of the best that Hilton has to offer in Orange County CA!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 Star review! We appreciate your great comments regarding our staff, amenities, and breakfast. I will definitely be sharing your comments with our staff. Our top priority is to make sure all our guests have a great experience.  We hope to see you back soon for another great stay! Sincerely, Kara Kellogg

Summary: we were surprised at the size of the man made lake that fronts the hotel.  had a glass of wine from the bar and took an evening stroll around the lake in the evening,  very pleasant.  breakfast was good, freeway close.  cookies of course (doubletree's thing).  would have given it 5 stars but out tv did not work, ok for us but not fro some people.

The Double Tree Club is nicely located, really close to Santa Ana/John Wayne and conveniently close to the freeways. It's an older property, but nicely redecorated and very well-maintained with a friendly, helpful staff. One negative - parking is not free, but they have a valet for the same price as self-park, so it's a wash.

I stayed at the Double Tree in Santa Ana for 2 nights while a friend and I participated in the Surf City Half Marathon.  We were welcomed by the Front Desk staff with warm cookies and the rest of our trip went exactly the same way -- the staff at the hotel were all amazing -- from the cleaning staff, to the restaurant staff, to the front desk.  They all went out of their way to assist us.  They even stood in 2 lines on either side of the entrance, cheering for us, when we returned from the race!  How wonderful was that!!??  I would definitely recommend it.

Heater and AC will keep you up at night because it has not been upgraded since 1990. Do not use the dry cleaning service, they lost my clothes and then overcharged me.  The front lobby staff at this hotel are not interested in customer service.  They are not led to service customers.  Managers are never present.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We are sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations. I hope that if you return to the area, you will give us another opportunity to make it right! Best regards, Kara Kellogg Kara.kellogg@hilton.com

Summary: I stayed at the DoubleTree Club in Hutton Centre for two nights while my home nearby was being tented for termites.  I booked well in advance and was able to get a rate under $100.  I found the staff courteous and helpful.  I was given the room I requested in my reservation: a corner king, although it wasn't on a Hilton Honors floor.  Unfortunately, the room I was assigned was on the corner nearest the 55 Freeway, which passes near the hotel. The freeway noise was problematic.  Fortunately, the front desk was able to move me to a room on a Hilton Honors floor that faced the little pond in Hutton Centre.  Like others who have posted on here, I did notice a bit of a stale odor in my room, but that odor seemed to go away when I turned off the air conditioning unit.  The breakfast

Three of us stayed at this Doubletree for four nights over the Super Bowl weekend as I participated in the Surf City Marathon. The hotel staff was very friendly, attentive and helpful. We were allowed to check in before the usual 3 pm time.  The room was typical for Doubletree, very clean and modern. Even though near Hwy 55 and the SNA Airport our room was extremely quiet, with no perceptible outside noise. The local grounds are quiet and relaxing, with a nice manmade lake with ducks adjacent to the property. The swimming pool and hot tub were clean and we enjoyed both. The valet parking and self-parking were convenient and efficient. The onsite restaurant was good, and there are several local eateries, including a Starbucks, within walking distance. We found it an ideal
Manager Response: Thank you for the great 5 star review! We appreciate all the great comments regarding our hotel, our staff, the location, and even the ducks. Making happy guests is our first priority. We will be sharing your nice comments with our staff.  We hope to see you back next year for another great Marathon weekend. Best regards,  Kara Kellogg

Summary: The hotel and staff did an amazing job to attend to every detail of our stay.  The hotel was clean, the cookies were delicious and our stay was memorable.  The hotel staff were polite, flexible, and arranged our transportation for a very large group. It was a flawless execution!

I recently stayed there for the Surf City Half Marathon and the experience was beyond what I expected. The hotel had my room ready early, offered us free cookies (delicious) upon check in, free wifi, clean and tidy room, late check out without even asking, and the staff was courteous and helpful, from the valet attendant, to the front desk clerk, and the housekeeping woman outside our room. Everyone greeted us and was super polite!  As for the race...I've stayed at many hotels for races and this one is by far my favorite! Delicious carb load dinner the night before, amazing buffet breakfast the morning of, organized and fast shuttle service, and to top it off, a standing ovation by several of the staff members lined up in the lobby, for the participants upon our arrival after

I would highly recommend this hotel.  The staff was awesome and the event was well organized.  If traveling solo or need group help I would suggest you stay here.  The grounds are beautiful and everyone was extremely friendly.

Summary Heading: If it isn't broke no need to stay anywhere else.
Summary: Once again the DoubleTree took great care of us while we stayed there during our Surf City running weekend.  The staff is so great and this was my third year in a row enjoying the location and amenities.

Summary Heading: Staff went out of their way to make us feel welcome and accommodated us in every way!
Summary: Very clean, super nice people and a quiet location- even with a freeway next to it and airport across from that. We used the pool every day, grounds and pool were very clean and uncrowned. Shuttle drivers were friendly and timely most of the time. We took walks frequently around the lake (man made) in front of the hotel that takes you around a business park and condo area. The lake has turtles and ducks that can be fed- kids loved that. Area felt very safe, would stay again! Also, wonderful housekeeping staff!

This hotel was recommended by race organizers.  I stayed February 1, 2015 for 1 night with a friend for the Surf City half marathon.  I was worried at first that the distance from the race to the hotel was far. Double Tree put me at ease the second I got of my car.  I checked in and was greeted by a smiling face and offered me a warm cookie.  Yum!!  I was then confirmed for the shuttle to and from the race. Upon our return from the race the next day, the staff all lined up and greeted us with applause and cold water.  I've stayed at my share of hotels but the staff went above and beyond.  A lot of perks for the runners such as carb load dinner the night before to complimentary breakfast and free parking.  I will definitely stay here again next year.

I am a Hilton Honors Gold Member and stay at many hotels each year. This DoubleTree is the very BEST I've experienced. I will definitely stay here again. We ran the Surf City Half Marathon and they clapped and cheered for us upon our return. They also offered a late checkout so we could shower after the race.

Business trip required booking at this hotel.  I would not choose the hotel and do not recommend unless there are no other alternatives.  Staff generally helpful but rooms are noisy, shabby, poor lighting, unsafe tub/shower.  Restaurant has limited menu with very inconsistent preparation and presentation.  Look for another property in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the disappointment with your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will give us another try if your travels bring you back to the area. Best regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary: I really enjoyed this hotel. It is a small boutique doubletree very close to the airport. Check in was quick and courteous and cookie was a nice touch. The room was spacious clean and modern and the price very reasonable. The breakfast was very good and the pool area relaxing although slightly close to the highway it didn't bother me too much. I just turned up pandora little. :). Will stay here again!

Price was great and the quality of the room and over-all hotel was excellent.  We stayed for a short getaway weekend but would not hesitate to stay here again. Breakfast wasn't that great for a buffet.  It was more of a continental breakfast with a hefty price.  I would go else where next time for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review!  We are glad to know that your weekend getaway was a great experience! We will be reviewing your comments with our staff and mangers to make any improvements where needed. We hope you will return for your next weekend getaway! Regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary: I really enjoyed the lake outside the hotel.  I would walk to Starbucks every morning and then walk around the lake.  Very Peaceful.  Great Service and nice clean room.  Loved the warm cookies. I had one every night before i went to bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We are glad you had such a nice and enjoyable stay. We  feel our Lakeside setting is something that makes our property special. We hope to see you back soon and will have the cookies waiting! Sincerely, Kara Kellogg

Summary: I debated between 2 and 3 stars for this review. I did 3 because the staff at check-in were quite friendly and accommodating. The room was clean (as long as you didn't use your nose).   THE GOOD There is a pond adjacent to the property which is quite beautiful.  The front desk and Valet staff were friendly and efficient.   THE BAD When we first arrived the room's A/C was on. It had a strange smell that almost resembled urine. It was a window mount unit that is quite dirty. The heat was not much better. We called the front desk and offered to move us to a different room with the disclaimer that all the rooms have the same unit. Before calling we decided to give it a try and get settled for the night. It did not go away, but by the time we had called it was late and we were too

Was here one night after a film festival. Got in too late to have dinner but enjoyed a few drinks before retiring. The staff is wonderful the breakfast above par and the location very easy to get to the airport. Of course the cookies are always a nice touch. :)

Summary Heading: The Cookie Hotel was the Complete package!
Summary: We stayed at this hotel while in town for a softball tournament. The rooms were clean and the basic breakfast (eggs, sausage, bacon, fruit, pastries, etc) was plentiful. Our girls loved the fresh cookies given out daily and took to calling it "the cookie hotel". On the weekend there werent a lot of choices within walking distance for eating. There was a nearby Starbucks.

Summary Heading: Overall Excellent Stay, but did not like the pillows!
Summary: We mostly enjoyed our stay here. There were some quirks, such as they were having a water pressure problem that carried over to the next day and affected our shower for the first 15 minutes (I was about to complain to the Front Desk, but thankfully the water pressure improved/returned after 15 minutes).  Also, it was a bit annoying that Housekeeping began vacuuming the halls at 10AM every morning. I've never heard them much at other hotels, but the vacuuming was loud and woke us up everyday. I don't know if they were vacuuming the hallways or they leave the door open while vacuuming the other rooms.  But our biggest concern was that THE PILLOWS KEPT GOING FLAT and weren't comfy. I really think they should change their pillows. I think they were some sort of down

Great hotel.  Two Doubletree, so make sure you get this one.  Amenities are great.  Breakfast is continental, not as I have had at other Doubletree's.  Shuttle to airport is only 5 minutes.  Excellent customer service.

This hotel exceeded my expectations. The feel is more like a boutique hotel with a very attentive staff. The lakeside bistro was perfect to meet family/friends for breakfast and lunch. Loved seeing the Egyptian Geese at the lake and feeding the ducks.

This is a very convenient hotel to John Wayne airport, on a side street in an office complex area.  The building is attractive from the outside (though it's one of the smaller Doubletree's I've stayed at), and the restaurant area is small but nice.    However, the rooms could be improved ... they're small, but a bigger complaint is that the A/C unit was so noisy that I hardly slept the first night I was there (I told the front desk about it the next morning, and they had maintenance do something to the unit ... it was a bit better the next night, but still too loud).  I also had to bring the hairdryer down to the desk because it was intermittent (turned on an off when you move it) ... I was concerned that this could be a hazard ... they did bring me a replacement which worked
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your recent stay - we appreciate your honest feedback, and we are very sorry for the difficulties that you experienced. Your review provides details that our hotel team needs to re-evaluate guest needs and meet guest expectations. Again, we apologize for any inconveniences, and we hope to have another chance to serve you and make it right in the future. Best regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary: It was not the hotel when I visit this area but I don't mind to visit this hotel again. They provides good service, room condition and meal and make me confortable. also room rate is very resonable. Everyday when I return my room, I felt good with very clean room.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review. We are happy to hear that you had such a nice stay at our property. Happy guests are our priority! It looks like we were able to succeed, with everything from price to room comfort and cleanliness. We hope to see you back at the Doubletree Club Orange County Airport! Sincerely, Kara Kellogg

Summary: This Doubletree Club has the beat breakfast of any hotel in my many years of experience.  It changes each morning to keep it interesting.  The term club is an apt one as they treat you so well. Do give this friendly place a try.  Dot

Summary Heading: Not a true Double Tree experience
Summary: There's a double tree across the street on McArthur, stay there! this is an old hotel and it shows it's age. I was at this location for a friends wedding and paid the same for this room as I would have at the other Double Tree in the area but this place was rinky dinky... the room was SMALL the the air conditioner was noisy and the call button didn't work for the elevator on the 6th floor.

The quality of the staff is excellent - friendly, courteous, and helpful - they are a pleasure to see every month.  Also, the rooms are exceptionally clean, which means so much when one travels. I recommend that all of the people in the cleaning service should get a raise.

This is a comfortable hotel and an excellent value.  Beds were pretty comfortable, room appeared clean and it was fairly quiet  The bar area is somewhat limited and the food menu is limited at best; however, the staff were very attentive.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel We are glad to hear you were pleased with the bed comfort and cleanliness of the rooms. Our housekeeping staff does a great job, and we will be sharing your nice words with them. We will also share your comments regarding our menu with our F&B manager. We hope your travels will bring you back next time you are in Orange County! Best regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary: My wife travels here for work frequently. She always picks this hotel.I have been along several times and understand why.Denise runs the front desk efficiently and the rest of the crew always give us a wonderful stay
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We are so glad to hear that you and your wife are frequent guests. We appreciate the nice comments and will definitely share with Denise and our staff.  We hope to see you back soon!  Have a great Holidays!  Sincerely,  Kara Kellogg

Summary: All Doubletree hotels are a special treat - but this one wins the award hands down for customer service, ambiance and comfort. You feel as though you are coming home to family - and with the little lake and the ducks and egrets right outside your door? What could be better!
Manager Response: Thank you for the GREAT 5 star review! As one of our return guests, we are so pleased to hear that you feel like you are coming home to family.Your review will definitely be shared with our staff. It is always nice to hear such great comments. We hope to see you back many more times for another wonderful stay. The ducks and egrets will be waiting! Sincerely, Kara Kellogg

Summary: Service was awesome! Very clean hotel with a wonderful staff!! Breakfast was great and location is perfect!! Beds were very comfortable. We were down in that area for my daughter's softball showcase and the staff accommodated us in every way!! Definitely would stay  there again!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review! We are glad your experience with everything from cleanliness and breakfast, to our staff was wonderful. We hope to see you back during the next showcase in the Orange County area. Best regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary: Very clean, efficient and close to the business areas in Santa Ana.  Staff was friendly, room was well appointed and very comfortable.  Hotel bar/restaurant had a nice menu, food of good quality.  I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We are glad to hear that you had a great stay. I will be sharing all your positive comments with our employees and managers.   We hope to see you again at the Doubletree Club Orange County!  Regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary: Great hotel!  Staff were very friendly and professional and went out of their way to make our stay comfortable.  Warm chocolate chip cookies upon arrival, and a sparkling clean room.  Great breakfast with lots of choices.  Would definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are happy to hear you nice comments regarding our staff. I am glad they made your stay a great one.   We hope to see you back and will have the warm Doubletree Cookies waiting.  Best regards,  Kara Kellogg

Summary: Every part of this hotel is accommodating, from the valet parking attendants to the front desk to the maid service.  It was very clean and inviting without feeling ostentatious.  The only complaint I have at all is that there are several Hiltons/Doubletrees in the area and shuttle service at the airport was difficult.  Several people including myself got on the wrong shuttle and the shuttle driver's couldn't help.

This hotel is located near the John Wayne airport in Orange County CA.  the staff is helpful and the rooms are clean.  I will definitely stay again.   It is close to restaurants and the interstates.  The price is spot on as well.  I found the staff to be helpful with service directiions and parking.

Excellent place to stay that is close to everything important in Orange County. The staff has always been helpful every time that I have stayed there and they are professional. Make this your place to stay in Orange County if you can.

I was checked in on my first day by Denise and she was very friendly and professional. Had an excellent stay the entire 3 nights I was in. Fitness center was great too. Highly recommend this awesome hotel!

This is a first class hotel.  I always stay here when traveling through Orange County/John Wayne.  Breakfast buffet is outstanding; service is wonderful.  Rooms are spacious, clean and well equipped.  Free wi fi

My boyfriend and I stayed here for BlizzCon weekend. It was a great hotel and not that far from the event. We enjoyed the accommodations and it's close to a few restaurants and shops. I would definitely book my stay here if I were ever in the area again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice review! We are happy that you and your boyfriend enjoyed the accommodations. We hope to see you back during the next BlizzCon, if not sooner! Regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary: I had to make a last minute reservation for a guest and wanted all charges taken care of on me.  The front desk was very friendly and efficient helping me accomplish this, including calling me back to confirm everything was all set for my guest to be able to have a care-free check in.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the nice comment regarding our front desk staff. It will definitely be shared with them.  We hope that you will continue to send guests our way, and we will make sure they have a great stay! Best regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary: I had a large group, and the hotel delivered on everything they promised. Great breakfast, comfortable rooms, easy check-in and check-out, friendly staff. We are returning to Los Angeles again for another event in 2015 and have already booked my group in the hotel again!

Excellent Guest Service. Staff went out of there was to ensure our needs. Staff offered extra cookies for our kids, help fill our cooler with ice. The rooms were clean and well maintained. The little things matter.

The Hotel is nice and clean. Good place to stay if you don't need internet and don't mind paying to park your car there. I did ask for a microwave in my room and one was sent to my room within minutes. They have a shuttle for dinner which is good because I don't think they have enough parking for all their rooms. I had to have the valet park my car one night
Manager Response: Thank you for the TripAdvisor review. We are happy to hear your comments regarding our hotel cleanliness. We do apologize for any inconvenience you had when  parking. Our lot does sometimes fill up and on those occasions we will gladly valet park your vehicle at no additional fee. We hope this will make parking easier for our guests. We hope to see you back when coming to the OC! Best regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary: I had never stayed at this hotel in the past but it was chosen for me by our travel department.  I was pleased with the location as it was close to my customer but shopping, freeways, dining and so much more.  The front desk was friendly and helpful, the rooms were updated and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice review! We appreciate your positive comments regarding our staff and our hotel. We recently completed some guest room updates including new carpet in all rooms. We hope that you will return to the Doubletree Club on your next visit to the area. Regards, Kara Kellogg

Summary: Stayed at this hotel on a Friday and Saturday night for a class I had being held in the hotel.  Both nights were sold out and the hotel was very busy.  Every employee we dealt with was Wonderful!!  Although very busy they took time to meet my requests and were very warm and friendly.  Good sense of humor abounded and smiles everywhere.  I am talking from the front desk clerks, to the maids, dining room staff...everyone was GREAT!

We used this hotel as our half way stop on our way to San Diego. The setting is beautiful, we had a nice walk around the large pond & water features. Our room was large, clean, & we heard nothing! The staff was friendly, and helpful. We had dinner at the bar, the food was excellent& they have large selection of beer. We will definitely stay here again!

We stayed here for a stay to play tournament a couple times and have never been disappointed. The people who work the buffet in the morning are very pleasant and keep the food stocked.  The only thing is on Sunday when teams have 8:00am games and have to be at fields by 6:30 or 7:00am, it would be nice if breakfast opened a bit earlier.

This was the second time that I stayed here.  Great location, close to highways and everything else I needed to visit.  I accidently made a reservation for two nights instead of three.  Even though the hotel was booked, they found me a room and even gave it to me at the same price.  Then, the next morning, when I was going to shower and check out/in, the shower would not turn off and was full blast hot.  So, I had to leave the room and get my other room right away.
