We were able to cancel the reservation (no penalties) per no early checkin honored for one of of our three rooms. We ended up booking our 3rd room @ The Marriott who were able to service our early checkin request for the

Great staff, lovely rooms, super pool, lovely breakfast buffet, and a little lake with ducks that eat out of your hand! It's like a tiny but fabulous European resort hidden away in the middle of the city. We love it!

It's an okay hotel.  I throught the price was a little to high for this hotel but again it's California I suppose.  I was able to book a different hotel after my conference a lesser price though and it was a much better hotel.  I would recommend it but not for over $159 a night that I had to pay, not that much for sure.

A great place to stay in Southern California, near the airport and close to Disneyland.  Close to business for us and with good food and service. Warm cookies on reception, early registration and valet parking if you like.

Our stay at the Double Tree was quite enjoyable, clean, great location & staff. In room breakfast dining was excellent, it literally came like 5-10 minutes after I placed my order over the phone! An additional treat at this Orange County was the ducks outside in the pond, all I can say is bring enough bread! Overall experience was superb.

My experience was fine but the hotel was very tired looking and smelled of stale smoke. The business center staff was very professional and the cost to rent a meeting room was very reasonable. The close proximity to the Orange County airport was a plus.

Summary Heading: Solid Doubletree property and nice location.
Summary: Stayed here on a weekend for one   night recently. The front desk and   valet staff are friendly and made   my family feel welcome. Our   corner room was spacious and   clean. The breakfast buffet for   Hilton Diamond/Gold VIP members is a nice perk since other properties seem to be scaling down on the offerings to guests. The fitness center has a few machines as well as free weights.We enjoyed the quiet location near the lake and plan to make this our go to hotel when in the Orange County Area.

A repeat stay in this hotel coincided with a Family Reunion.  The hotel staff made the stay most pleasant, as was on the previous visits.  The staff goes the extra mile to make everyone's visit pleasant and trouble-free.  The hotel environment is attractive, the location is convenient to the John Wayne (Orange Country) airport.  The WARM cookies are very delicious!!!!  Will certainly return to this location again.

A very nice hotel.  I had free parking and it's a good sized lot so no issues there. They also offer valet.  The hotel is nice, a lake right out front that you can walk around and there are ducks to watch.  There are only a few restaurants walking distance, which is why I gave location average. I tried a little sushi one, not bad. I do believe the hotel has a shuttle to take you to others, but not positive which ones, I didn't use it.  I did eat at the hotel restaurant one night, the food I got was very good. The room's were very nice and clean, no issues.  I would stay here again if in the area.

The hotel was very clean and the staff very friendly.  I had an event for work the next day in Costa Mesa, and it was the perfect location because I was going opposite of the rush hour traffic in the morning.  The hotel is a little difficult to find since there is another Doubletree on a busy intersection, but other than that it was a nice stay.

Very quiet location because we stayed there during weekend.  Weekday I am not sure because it is right in the middle of many business offices, skyscraper.     10 mins drive from South Coast Plaza and many upscale restaurants.  Very friendly staff especially Ron at the Bar, would stay here again.

Summary Heading: Great hotel very convenient to SNA
Summary: I liked the location and the free breakfast and internet. Bed was very comfortable and service was great. Valet fee $11 regardless of whether you use it but then early morning the desk just gives you your key. Restaurant in hotel or down at corner of hutton.

The staff was very friendly and welcoming. The room was well appointed and very comfortable. The property was situated on a man-made lagoon that has a nice walking path around it. The only issues was housekeeping knocked on the door each morning at 8:30, even when I had the "privacy" lock engaged on the door, there was no door sign, the lockset had a "privacy "switch" on it.

Our family stayed here over Thanksgiving and had a nice stay. Nothing fancy, but it was clean, quiet and comfortable. We required two queen beds and there are not a lot of hotels in the area that have queen beds. We would stay here again the next time we're in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review on TripAdvisor! We are glad you and your family enjoyed your stay over the Thanksgiving Holiday. We hope to see you back soon, and will have your two queen beds waiting. Kara Kellogg

Summary: This hotel was nice and served my purpose well. All employees were great and very helpful. The breakfast was very good and changed daily. I enjoyed being able to sit along side of the lake and also stroll around the lake.

Traveled to Irvine for business, and chose this location.   Staff - Front Desk person was awesome!  He was very helpful.  Also loved the hot cookie!!!  Since I was a rewards member, he gave me free WiFi and daily breakfast.  More on the breakfast later.   Room - more or less was excellent.  It was clean.  The bed was big and comfy.  The work space was adequate if not better. Breakfast - This was a gem!  The quality of breakfast was quite enjoyable for me.  What made it also delightful was the view of the fountain area while eating my breakfast.   Parking - my only gripe, which kept my review from being even higher, was that this place seemed to always host events, and thus the parking lot was almost always filled.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel. Our small lakeside setting is great for our business travelers to enjoy and relax. From the accommodations to our buffet breakfast, we are happy you were pleased. We do recognize that our lot does sometimes fill. We will gladly have our valets park your car at no extra charge if this does occur. Thank you again for the review and we hope to see you back Kara Kellogg

Summary: The Doubletree is a great hotel.  The location is close to John Wayne airport but was very quiet.  The staff were all very friendly and helpful.  The rooms were stylish and clean with comfortable beds.  I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for the great review! We are so happy that you were pleased with our hotel and great staff. Knowing that our guests are happy is what we strive for. We hope to see you back in the near future. Kara Kellogg

Summary: Every time I have stayed at this hotel I am treated like family.  Each staff member treat me like I am royalty. They go out of their way to make my stay enjoyable and comfortable. The staff is professional with courtesy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful 5 star review! We are so pleased to hear about our great staff and how they made you feel at home. I will share this with all team members. They will be so pleased. We hope to see you back when you return to Orange County! Kara Kellogg Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed here for two nights on business. Used the hotel shuttle from the airport, arrived within minutes. Great shuttle driver. Property is in business park like setting on lake. Nice area, restaurants within drive distance. Restaurant and bar on property was nice, good food. My room was booked through employer and the rate included breakfast and internet. I'm a silver member and two bottles of water were waiting in my room upon arrival and of course the cookie. I had two queen beds on the sixth floor. Smaller flat screen TV, beds and pillows were comfortable, good shower. The room was comfortable. If I were analyzing every detail, the room needs updating compared to other Doubletree properties. The carpet in the room was worn and had was bubbling in some spots. The ceiling had
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice review. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us overall. We will be doing some updates on our guest rooms over the next month or two. We think our guests will be pleased. Thank you again for the review and we hope to serve you again in the near future. Kara Kellogg

Summary Heading: Great  all around Hotel to Conduct Multiple Day Company Meetings
Summary: I am a Regional Sales Manager for a National Company and have held bi-annual meetings for a least the last five years. I regularily  have our Associates fly in from all over the country into John Wayne Airport and the convience of this property is a huge plus. The meeting and guest rooms are both very funtional and comfortable. The main reason I continue to return is the management team and staff (Kara, Mary, Daniel & Tony). The go out of their way to make you feel like you are the most important guest/client in the day, every day, everytime. They make my job as meeting host and planner almost effortless. This keeps our company returning every year. Signed Mark A. GCC
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review! Our entire staff looks forward to having your group stay with us year after year. Mary, Daniel & Tony feel you and your group are part of our Doubletree family. We look forward to hosting many more events with you, and will continue to give you the customer service you should receive. See you soon! Kara Kellogg

Summary: The pictures make the hotel look much better than it is.  Overall, it was an average hotel.  The rooms were mostly clean.  There were a couple of issues in one room, but when we told the staff, they said they will come back to address, but didn't. Location is decent - just off the freeway means easy access to things.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We always value our guests comments, good or bad. We are sorry to hear that your stay was not what you expected. I will be addressing your comments with our department heads to find out why and how we fell short. If you decide to return  to the area in the future, please feel free to contact me directly. We will make your stay a great one. Kara Kellogg kara@dtcluborangeco.com

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel.  Great location.  Great view.
Summary: Loved this place.  Everyone was friendly, there is a beautiful pond on the grounds, good breakfast, nice and comfortable rooms.  Great location, right by the highway.  What more could you want? Well, actually parking was very limited.  But, I got there several times around 9:00 and still found a space.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great TripAdvisor review. Happy guests like you are what we strive for.  Our lakeside setting is great for relaxing at the end of the day. Parking can be limited at times, but our valets are always happy to park your vehicle at no additional fee.  We hope to see you back soon at the Doubletree Club!

Summary Heading: 2nd time stay, Great deal for those who travel a lot.
Summary: 65 hotels a year and this is the only review I have done on a hotel.  Great location for the business traveler.  A super verity in local food to choose from and the hotel food it pretty good. Great pool, good place to to walk. Room are always spotless and and the staff is extremely friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. With 65 hotel stays a year, we are pleased you decided to review us. A great comment from a frequent traveler means a lot to us. We hope to make everyone’s stay as good as yours. Hope to see you back next time you are in Orange County!

Summary: The service here is fine but I was surprised at how old and shabby the furniture was in the room.  Smelled like it had been smoked in even though it was a non-smoking floor.  AC unit was very noisy so had to leave it off...

Summary Heading: Good for a quick business stay. Customer service needs polishing.
Summary: I stayed for 1 night in October of 2013.  Pros:  Good food and strong drinks Good sleep quality Great shower-head (finally!)  Cons: Rooms are slightly dated (smallish TVs, standard definition channels) Slow wireless Valet service needed polishing  Check-in was quick and efficient. I always appreciate the cookie and water bottles.   My room was clean and well-appointed. I listed the TV as one of my "cons" because of the size and picture quality. Overall, this wasn't a huge problem for me. But, I have 50 hotel nights in the past 3 months and this TV was the smallest I've seen and had the most standard/low definition channels.   I logged into the wireless to complete some work before dinner. The wireless was quite slow such that I could not successfully watch a YouTube video or
Manager Response: On behalf of the Doubletree Club Orange County Airport, we want to thank you for the review. We are always striving to improve, and our guests comments, good or bad are taken seriously. I am happy that there were many positives during your stay.  We will be doing some hotel upgrades over the next couple months along with continuing employee trainings. Our guests are our top priority. We hope you will give us another try in the future.

Summary: I have been a loyal Hilton member for years but have recently stated staying at Holiday Inns. I had a theft at a Houston hotel back in June w no follow up by Hilton and my stay last weekend was highlighted by not having my room cleaned. Very disappointed because I relly like Hilton but dont think they appreciate me or my business.

This Doubletree provided free shuttle service to it's clients, in a 4 mile radius. I was unable to book into another hotel for a conference - it  was a very nice surprise not to have to pay for cabs back and forth between my venue. The shuttle drivers were friendly informative and very accomodating...
Manager Response: On behalf of The Doubletree Club Hotel, we want to thank you for the 5 star review.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay and that our shuttle drivers were helpful and friendly,  We hope to see you back if you return to Orange County!

Summary Heading: Perfectly acceptable and with Very comfortable beds!
Summary: Don't get confused by the other double tree a block away. I have to travel here once a month on business and this is where we meet over a long weekend. Cons: They do not serve lunch over the weekends, which necessitates going out, when all I want to do is have a quick bite and a rest in my room. The food is fine, but nothing spectacular. It's next to the freeway, which is not awful, but I definitely hear it. The windows in the rooms do not open. Ick! Pros: the lake is nice to walk around during breaks. Hotel staff is all very friendly and seem eager to help. The front desk staff would benefit from a little polishing - a bit more professional in appearance perhaps, but always warm. Love that the shuttle will take me to Trader Joe's and back, and the drivers are cute and

Summary Heading: Great breakfast, clean rooms, front desk needs training though.
Summary: HHonors Diamond Member. Recently booked 3 rooms. The property water feature was nice, and the property didn't feel too busy or noisy. On check-in the front desk staff were not very welcoming however.  Seemed as though we were bothering them by checking in. Rooms were good however and breakfast was well stocked and very good.  The rooms were very clean and I was quite impressed with the tissue flower that had been created in the bathroom. (See pic)  These kind of things make a stay seem special.  The main problem was on check-out.  I asked the front desk person to please combine all 3 rooms into one portfolio.  This is a standard procedure and required for HHonors member to get stay credit for at least 2 rooms.  It's a simple matter of transferring all charges onto 1 room.  The
Manager Response: On behalf of the DoubleTree Club OC Airport staff, I would like to first thank you for bringing this up to our attention. I am really interested in knowing in depth how your stay was at our hotel. At your best convenience, please contact me at 714-751-2400, or via email at Chris.Cossio@Hilton.com in order to better serve you. Thank you!

Summary: I liked the clean bedding and comfortable bed.  I had a nice view toward the lake.  You can take a nice walk right outside the hotel as long a weather permits.  They provided a good breakfast with a variety of items.  The room was very quiet.  I liked the overall experience.

Stayed here two nights on a business trip.  The staff were friendly, competent and helpful in numerous ways.  The room was very clean and fresh.  The heat/ac unit is effective but somewhat old fashioned. Oh, and the pillows are AWESOME!

Excellent hotel,  I would stay again.  The front desk staff was amazing and I never had a problem with the room not being clean.  The breakfast was free and very good. There is also free wifi which was useful for my stay. The location is very good because it is both convenient to airport and to my training location.

For a place to stay, either for business or pleasure we always look to DoubleTree or other Hilton Properties that are in the area because they are consistently a good value and we have pleasant stays.

We just hosted our entire sales team for a full day meeting set and couldn't have been more pleased. The space was perfect, staff extremely attentive and the everything went off without a hitch. Having lots of odds and ends demands for our meetings, the staff took care of us like champions making our day smooth as could be. Huge shout out to the Food & Beverage staff & Sales & Marketing team for your superior excellence! Thank you!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review! We are glad your meeting experience was a good one. Our great staff is something we pride ourselves on at our hotel, along with keeping our guests happy. We hope you will return next time you have an event in the area.

Summary: This hotel was nicely appointed and comfortable for the money.  Restaurant on premises was good and priced equal to the hotel type.  There are a few restaurants kitty corner that serve low price meals (Mexican, sushi and stir fry).  It had parking that I didn't use, an airport shuttle and internet (free for some, but not all).  It is about 15 minutes from John Wayne/Orange County airport.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Doubletree Club By Hilton staff and management, we want to thank you for your nice review. We are happy you had an enjoyable stay. It's nice to hear we are providing our guests with good food and service. The food court is just a short walk away along the lakeside path. We hope you return when visiting the Orange County area!

Summary: Not up to Doubletree standard...just ok...Our room had 2 beds when we reserved 1 king,so it was a bit of an annoying inconvenience....also,could clearly hear TV in next room.Rooms have the 2 doors, (Which I hate-God forbid you unlock)...Neighborhood is in Industrial Park,so there are no restaurants in walking distance...just ok for quick in/out airport access-there is a free shuttle to and from John Wayne airport
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor. We appreciate all comments good and bad. I apologize for the inconveniences you had during your stay, and have reviewed your comments  with our management. If you decide to return to the area, please contact me directly. I will make sure you are in your requested room type and not in a connecting room. We do have a few connecting rooms available for the families that like to have the easy access to each other.  We hope to see you back! kara@dtcluborangeco.com

Summary Heading: Wonderful boutique hotel in the center of OC
Summary: We held a 50th anniversary celebration at this hotel and family from all over Canada and the US stayed at this hotel.  We had a great time and although each member had their own room, they were constantly meeting in the elevator, the dining room the lakeside bistro etc. because its a small hotel.  We used all the amenities to good advantage and highly recommend this hotel to anyone who prefers 4 floors to the usual high rise hotel.  The hotel is very well kept and up to date, airy and spacious, even in the rooms which are quite large.  The staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast had a variety of entrees and completely  satisfied everyone there.
Manager Response: On behalf of The Doubletree Club Hotel we want to thank you for the 5 star review! We are glad the you and your family had such a great time during your stay with us. Being a smaller property allows us to give our guests that little extra that hopefully makes for a great stay. We hope to see you and your family back when you return to Orange County!  Kara Kellogg

Summary: The hotel has modern decor though it appears old and a bit grungy on the outside.  Unfortunately the remodel was not thorough enough.  The hotel is posted "Non-Smoking" but the room still carried a pungent stale smoke smell.  I am sure it was once smoking room; likely for many years.  The redesign before making it a "non-smoking room" was not thorough enough.  I could hardly sleep from the stench.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response on TripAdvisor. We appreciate all guest feedback. As you said, our hotel may not be the best looking on the outside, but we do beleive that our lakeside setting,  great staff, and customer service are above and beyond. We are very sorry about the smoke smell in the room. We do once in a while have a  guest that unfortunately decides to smoke in a non-smoking hotel. We do our best when deep cleaning those rooms and it can take  an extra process. If you decide to return to the area, please feel free to contact me and I will make sure you are in one of our best "smelling" rooms. Kara Kellogg kara.kellogg@hilton.com

Summary: I thought ventilation systems in bathrooms were code.  Maybe not.  This hotel doesn't have them.  So they stink after using the toilet and steam from the shower stays put and fogs up the mirror.  The fancy cabinet hiding the refrigerator had no ventilation!  It was very hot inside!  I'm sure one of these days one of them will cause a fire.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your reveiew on Tripadvisor. All feedback is greatly appreciated to help us continue to provide our guests a great stay. We are sorry your stay did not meet your expectations. I can assure you that our hotel is up to code and all  bathrooms do have exhaust fans. We will continue to inspect them all , to make sure they are  in the best working order. We hope that if you return to the area, you will give us another try. Kara Kellogg

Summary: I stayed here as part of a business trip to Irvine.   The rooms are a good size and very clean.  The air conditioning was quiet and efficient.  Close to the airport and to other buildings in the commercial center.  1/2 of the hotel is "club level" which shows that they focus on Hilton Honors and frequent travelers.  Much of the hotel is well executed.
Manager Response: On behalf of the staff and management of the Doubletree Club, we want to thank you for the nice 5 STAR review. We appreciate you coming back year after year! It's loyal customers like you that keep us striving to make our service #1.   We look forward to having you back with us soon for another great event!  Kara Kellogg/DOS

Summary Heading: Great hotel with friendly and helpful staff
Summary: I have been having business meetings at this hotel for over 10 years. The catering staff is truly exceptional. Everyone is always eager to help. Many of the staff members have been with this hotel for many years. It has a very low turnover rate in the restaurant. That usually means they are all happy with management and my guess is that management treats them well. A happy staff means satisfied customers.  The sleeping rooms are modern and the beds are comfortable. Every room has a large desk with lots of space for laptop computer. The buffet breakfast (often included with the room) has a good selection of food.  I highly recommend this hotel for business conferences and meetings. The hotel has free shuttle pickup and drop off at the John Wayne Airport. Very convenient.

I really enjoyed my stay at the DoubleTree Club by Hilton Orange Country Airport.  The location is ideal to the John Wayne Airport.  I was meet upon arrival with an friendly, expedient staff that served me a warm chocolate chip cookie and a smile.  The room and bathroom was roomy and clean.  Wish for a larger fitness room; very busy with early morning business people working out.  I loved the corporate package that included a nice room, valet parking, and a buffet breakfast.  Check-out was also very quick.  I usually do not stay at DoubleTree hotels, but I will consider these hotels in the future because of my pleasant stay at this particular hotel.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Doubletree Club By Hilton staff, we want to thank you for the wonderful review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and all of the amenites included in the "Corporate VIP Package". We hope you return next time you are in the Orange County area. Our staff will ensure you have another great stay. Kara Kellogg Director of sales

Summary Heading: Great Staff, Great Room & Great Breakfast
Summary: We stayed here on September 6 and checked out Sept. 7. After a long night of driving, we finally arrived to the hotel. The valet staff was very friendly, but Evan, a front desk agent was really friendly and even gave us a comped breakfast. The rooms were clean and for the price, it was fabulous.   The next morning we went down for breakfast, which overlooks a nice pond and the great morning sun. The staff there was very helpful and friendly.   Just wanted to say that the staff was great and that made an impact on our stay. I would definitely go back again!

Summary Heading: Mediocre Property, Really Poor Customer Service
Summary: This was my second and final time here.  I was lured by the slightly lower price compared to the other Hilton properties, but was quickly disappointed.   I arrived around 7:30 PM and checked in.  When I got to the room, they had me in a room the exact opposite of my profile.  I'm a Hilton Diamond member and had this reservation for weeks, so I was surprised by this.  I immediately went to the front desk and asked if they had a King in a quiet area (my original room was 2 doubles on a low floor next to the front drop off).    I was told by Evan that they don't really look at the profiles and just assign on a first come first serve basis.  I told him I had the reservation for weeks and was a diamond member with a clear profile.  Then, he made the mistake of telling me that of the
Manager Response: On behalf of the Doubletree Club by Hilton OC airport management, we thank you for your response on TripAdvisor. Our customer service is something that we are very proud of at this property. Unfortunately, it sounds as though we fell short  for your visit. We would like to discuss specifics with you and see what we can do to have you back with us. Please  contact Chris Cossio or I at chris.cossio@hilton.com., or kara@dtcluborangeco.com. We hope to hear from you soon!

Summary: Staff was great, very helpful. Breakfast buffet was good, bar was a good place to hang out for our group.  Room was very clean! Nice location by the lake and plenty of secure parking.  Local food places close early so make sure that you get there before 8pm.

Summary Heading: Great location, awesome staff, nice layout & amenities
Summary: There are two Doubletree properties within a few blocks of each other - but this DoubleTree Club is hands down the winner.  The parking staff is always friendly- yes, you do pay for parking but consider that the norm for nicer airport properties.  The hotel staff is Always friendly and welcoming... and this includes when we've stayed there with athletic teams. A hotel full of 17yr old girls can wear thin, the patience of the staff........... but not here.  They're always smiling.  Check in is easy, the rooms are consistant with this brand. Housecleaning always does a nice job too.  Great things about this property include the well planned breakfast area -- including the lakeside patio.  Nice option for morning coffee, or evening beverages.  The meal time staff has always been

The staff is very friendly and engaging.  Property is dated, but comfortable.  The window A/C unit is a bit noisy, but it works.  The parking is limited, but the valet is convenient for the same price.  Location is convenient to local casual dining and the airport.  We probably would stay again if in the area.

We stayed here for a long weekend in late August.  It was our first time here and left without any regrets. The employees here (valets, front desk, restaurant, and housekeeping) are among the friendliest in my travels.  We stayed on one of the Hilton Honors members floors and had a great Lakeview.  We never heard our neighbors or road noise from our location.  The only knock I have is there wasn't a microwave in the room and the a/c unit was a bit noisy.  Otherwise, the bed was comfy and cleaned adequately.  Self-parking at night can be dicey since the lot is a little small, but valet service will park it for you at the same price.  The hotel is conveniently located to many casual eating establishments (try Chicken Maison) and the Interstate.  If I needed to return to this city

Summary Heading: Consistently A Great Hotel & The Patio is Awesome
Summary: This was the 3rd time I've stayed at this property. Always welcoming and comfortable. With Hilton Honors status the Breakfast and Complimentary Drink each day is much appreciated not to mention the delicious cookies. The wireless works well and the rooms are quite good. Nice having the little fridge.  Possibly the most unique feature of the hotel is the patio overlooking a lake which si surrounded by mid-rise Class A Office Buildings. Take the time to enjoy a meal there! Would stay again

Summary Heading: Excellent service and another stress-free weekend stay
Summary: I specifically choose this hotel for weekend getaways every few months due to its strategic location, warm and friendly staff, and the comfortable accommodations. True, the bathrooms can be a bit dated (the low shower head is a challenge, for example) and it would be nice to have all cotton towels, but this is a minor issue in an overwhelmingly consistently positive experience. During this stay, the room had Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf coffee pods and coffee cups that were individually wrapped, which I thought were nice (not to mention more hygienic) touches. The kitchen staff during breakfast (I did not eat at the hotel otherwise) is always available and willing to assist and the front desk staff is always welcoming and attuned to requests. One warning--be prepared to wait a bit for

This was my second time staying here.  The staff was nice and attentive. The lake view is very pleasant and relaxing. I eat at restaurant twice and the food was good. The hotel seems to be not too big and not too small. It is also conveniently located to everything in Orange county if you have to get some business done.

Dated property but very well kept. Parking was limited which was a dissappointment especially when you have to pay for it. Easily accessible from the interstate. There is a pond with a walking trail that is very pleasant. Took the kids and fed the geese while walking the trail. Overall a very good experience.

We were traveling with a large group and had several rooms at this hotel.  The experience was terrific!  Close to mall and freeways.  The hotel offers a full breakfast with both hot and cold foods and fresh fruits of many kinds.  The hotel was quiet, the parking was safe and the hotel staff were very accommodating.  The only negative is limited dining options within walking distance - although only 1 1/2 miles drive to South Coast Mall.

I had never stayed at a DoubleTree before and was pleasantly surprised by the experience. I was just looking for a hotel close to the OC airport and picked this one from a web banner when I booked my rental car. It is attractively situated on a lake near business and residential buildings, within walking distance of a retail center (food). The architecture of the hotel is a bit odd, as is some of the decor. But the room was well-equipped, clean and comfortable, the facility clean and well-maintained, and the staff very friendly.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, great view, close to beach
Summary: This hotel was great; the room, the staff, the amenities. the only issue i had the entire stay was getting stuck in the elevator twice, for lengthy amounts of time. The location is close to newport beach. there are many restaurants. it is easily accessible from the highway.

Summary Heading: Bed was nice, the parking was horrendous!
Summary: Overall, the hotel was fine, but literally the parking situation was unacceptable.  There weren't any clearly marked places to park during registration (I got in around midnight), and then the parking lot was beyond small.  You would think the local municipalities wouldn't let them run a hotel with such unreasonable parking.  Get it together DoubleTree!

This hotel is in an excellent location,convenient to SNA,beaches,South Coast. There is a small lake on this property as well. The rooms were very nice and comfortable. They are rather spacious for an airport hotel. The staff is very nice abd professional. The rate was reasonable for this area.

Summary Heading: Fine unless there is a problem
Summary: Great kitchen/buffet, comfy pillows, nice man-made lake. Hotel front desk staff and valet manager disappointing. You have pay to park, and there is no side street parking anywhere nearby. But if there is a problem, such as your car getting hot in the lot, you will not get a call back.

You'll enjoy the friendly and prompt welcome from both the valets and front desk. The warm cookies are a nice touch and staff is very helpful about surrounding attractions. Bathrooms do not have exhaust fans so the bathroom does get steamed up from moisture.

We booked the corporate VIP rate which included free self parking, wifi, and breakfast for 2 people per day. Very worth it. Definitely get a Lakeside view because the other side of the hotel faces the freeway. We called the hotel to try and get a room on the highest floor possible (they gave us the 5th floor and had a total of 6 floors). No early check in, but very nice room with no issues. Breakfast was good and room service was great.

Our soccer club stayed here Aug 16 & 17, 2013 for a soccer tournament.  We had 2 teams - boys U17 & girls U11.  We could not have asked for a better hotel to meet our needs.  The rooms were ready on time, clean, and comfortable.  Michelle Van Winkle, sales manager and her staff, were extremely easy to work with - from setting up the group block to all the fine-tuning that comes with managing a large group.  She set us up with free breakfast (real breakfast - not yogurt and toast), and perks geared towards our group.  The hotel has a nice pool area, laundry facilities to wash our jerseys, a large pond with ducks and fish so the kids could roam about, and free warm cookies for everyone at check in!  I can't say enough nice things about our stay, and will definitely stay again for
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review about our property! We are pleased your team enjoyed our hotel, from the lake and the ducks to our hot buffet breakfast. We appreciate having our teams stay with us and think we have the perfect location for everyone to enjoy.  Let us know when you plan on returning, and Michelle will be ready to ensure you have another great stay! Thank you for staying with us! Kara Kellogg kara@dtcluborangeco.com

Summary: The hotel was clean, quiet and the staff was very attentive. I had to call several times for assistance (wireless internet access and the drapes), but they came and helped with everything without a problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review us on TripAdvisor. We are glad your stay with us rated a 5! We hope you return to  the Doubletree Club Orange County  when your plans bring you back to the area. Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights with my 3 boys for a lacrosse tournament and all went perfectly. Location was great, minutes from the airport and the lacrosse venue. Huge shopping center close by called "The District" had everything we needed. Package included free breakfasts, Wi-Fi and parking (part of the tournament promotion). Boys loved the pool, couldn't wait to hit it each day. I enjoyed having the lake nearby with ducks and even turtles to watch with a nice sitting area. Very quiet room. Food was great, kids especially liked the French toast. Room was nice, even had a refrigerator. Not a far drive to the beach, was able to go a few times between games. Overall, a great place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review of our property! We are glad your boys and yourself enjoyed your stay with us. Our lake is a little hidden jewel that our guests love. We hope you return next time you are in Orange County!

Summary: Julio, who is the evening bartender on some nights and is the waiting service for dinner on others, was incredibly courteous and welcoming throughout my stay.  My experience and enjoyment of the hotel increased substantially because of the great service provided by Julio.  Thank you.  - Andrew
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review. We appreciate your comments regarding Julio and the rest of our staff. Our guests are extremely important to us and customer service is the best way make to make them happy. We hope you return if you are ever back in the Orange County area!

Summary: Stayed for a soccer tournament. Everything was good for the price. The bathroom was a little dirty but I always travel with Clorox wipes and cleaned it up. Breakfast was ok, not a huge fan of the complimentary breakfasts. The staff was very friendly and helpful!

Flew into SNA (John Wayne Airport/Orange County, California) for a few days of work and stayed at the Double Tree.  The hotel rooms were spacious, clean and reasonable.  However, you pay for everything, for example: internet access, parking and breakfast.  If you want to be close to the airport it is very convenient.

We stayed here for three nights last weekend.  We were able to check in early.  Surprised that both valet and self parking are charged $11 per night, no difference.  After checking in and getting to our room, we turned the a/c on and it was very noisy.  We got used to it during the stay and it blocked out hall noise.  The room was clean and comfortable.  The hotel is situated on a little lake.  It was fun walking out to the lake to watch the birds!  Good stay.  Convenient to the beaches if you have a car and don't mind a 15 minute drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review us on Tripadvisor!  We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you will return in the future. If lucky, we may even have some new baby ducks!  Kara Kellogg DoubleTree Club By Hilton Orange County Airport Director of Sales 714-540-9551

Summary Heading: Double Tree Club Santa Anna, CA
Summary: I travel extensively and the staff at this hotel just gets what that means. They are friendly, helpful and always ready to make your stay better. It is clear they understand the frequent business traveler. I woudl assume the same service woudl apply to any individual or family styaing at thier hotel. It is also conviently located to the California highweay system and John Wayne Airport.

Summary Heading: No deal is worth bad service.
Summary: They did a terrible job checking in our team, making excuses and offering nothing to make up for their bad planning. The hotel was overbooked, understaffed and the restaurant closed to accomodate a wedding. Our air conditioner smelled like a burning hair dryer and the shower was motel 6 tile all the way. But we had a charming view of the parking lot to make up for it. Not really.

Summary Heading: Location good, service good, rooms average, spotlight aimed into room very bad!
Summary: Not sure why this is called a club hotel. Service is pretty good, staff is friendly, professional and knowledgable. The rooms are fine, not club quality, but fine. However, I am a diamond member and I expect to at least get a decent if not upgraded room. Instead I get a regular room on the 2nd floor with a spotlight pointed right into it & the cars pulling in are right under the room and are noisy. Really not comfortable for sleeping. But since they were 'full' they could not move me to an acceptable room, and nothing for being placed in a room with constant light. Not so good. Added a photo to show the issue.

Dirty hotel room with stained carpets, hair in the bathroom, broken closet and bathroom doors and outdated air conditioning with loud dirty unit along the window. The elevator was also temporarily broken.  Nice staff but that can't make up for an old out-dated building, especially when we saw another one of this brand (DoubleTree by Hilton) down the street. Building needs a major overhaul!

Stayed one night at this property last week.  It is very close to the Orange Co airport and easy to get to and from.  There was a meeting taking place at the property on Thurs night last week and the place was over run with attendees.  Their parking lot is extremely small and required me to valet park my rental car.  Upon arriving, the line awaiting the valet was long and I was out in the street waiting to enter the hotel for 15 minutes.   I finally walked onto the property and was told to leave the car and they would park it for me.  I had a early Flight the next morning and was concerned whether this place would have an attendant on duty at 5am.  They did and I was able to get the car, but it seems they needed to deal with this large meeting differently, so guests of the hotel

With the mini-lake and ducks to feed, great service, wonderful pool and amenities, this is the perfect place for a business or personal getaway. Room service is great - wonderful selections on TV - great choices for the buffet breakfast - and of course, the warm cookies you get when you register - you'll love it.

I was welcomed with very proper Valet Service.  The check in was a breeze and the rooms were awesome.  Clean and neat.  Very tidy.  I slept comfortably in a very bed that was not too hard and not too soft.  My daughter had no complaints about the sofa bed she slept in.  Breakfast was really nice.  Thank you for a wonderful experience.

Summary Heading: Nice stay for a business trip
Summary: The office I was visiting was just a couple of miles from the Doubletree so they were happy to pick us up from the office and bring us to the hotel.  Very nice drivers who later took us to the shopping area, then back to the hotel and back to the office the next morning.  The staff was friendly and helpful, my room was very nice, breakfast was good, and there was a Starbucks right across the street.  All that and with a warm cookie when we checked in!

Summary Heading: Acceptable hotel near the OC airport
Summary: This is not a raving endorsement, not is it a decidedly bad review either.  This hotel is just OK.  I do about 150 nights a year in hotels, across three different hotel families.  I just cannot get my head around the Doubletree brand.  You never know what to expect..some good, some just poor.  Aside from a cookie on arrival there is no consistency, no particular message that I can associate with this brand. Smaller property, sits next to a little pond, right on the 55 freeway.  The pool is basically on the freeway.  The elevators are just plain awful..slow and always a wait.  They have valet parking, but you on your own with cart if you want help with your bags.  I do have to commend two employees to be fair...Marissa at front desk and Orlando in the restaurant, both provided
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing us on Tripadvisor.com.     I wanted to apologize that our housekeeper did not knock prior to entering your room.   This is not a best practice of ours and I will bring this to the attention of the Director of Housekeeping.   I hope you can provide us another opportunity in the near future.     Feel free to contact me with any additional questions or concerns.  Best Regards,  David J. Arriola Director of Operations & Revenue Management DoubleTree Club by Hilton Orange County Airport Phone: (714) 751-2400 david.arriola2@Hilton.com

Summary: I've stayed here for a number of busniess trips. This past week several of my colleagues and I stayed here again for a four day training trip. I suggested to several of the students that they stay there as well. On our last night I invited several of the participants out to the smoking patio for a drink and a cigar. There were 8 people staying there, 32 night stays. About half way through our cigars we were informed that we couldn't smoke outside! The doors leading to the patio directed us to the smoking area! It has a sign on the doors! We questioned the staff member and he apologized saying the owner doesn't allow smoking on the patio! One of the instructors checked out and went across the street to the other Double Tree. The next morning I went down for breakfast and saw that
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. Guest feedback is incredibly important to us. We apologize for the confusion with our smoking policy and will be sure that the correct signs are posted in order to avoid any future misunderstandings. Thank you again for staying with us and we really hope that you'll come back and give us a second chance when your travels bring you back to our area.  Best Regards,  David Arriola Director of Operations & Revenue Management DoubleTree Club by Hilton Orange County Airport Phone: (714) 751-2400 Email: david.arriola2@hilton.com

Summary: Upon arrival the host was very friendly and funny.  He gave us extra cookies and boy were they yummy. My youngest son is a cookie monster and he kept the monster happy.  It was extremely clean, but elevator 1 was having a difficult time keeping up with the demand of customers.

Summary Heading: Comfortable, but needs some service help.
Summary: My family had three rooms here for a Disneyland trip and really enjoyed ourselves.  The drive to Disneyland was about 20 min and reverse commute, so we never had traffic!  The rooms were comfortable, but a little small.  Our only problem was with a couple services.  We had a five day stay with four people in our room and for some reason housekeeping refused to leave us more than two towels!  Lol - every night around midnight when we got back to the room, we had to call down for more towels.  I thought they might get it right by the time we checked out, but they never did.  We had a similar experience with the valet parking. Every day we called down to have the car brought around and every day we would get down to the valet and our car was not there.  Lol- some place between the

I made the reservations for my two granddaughters who were there to do some college visits.  My experience from the very beginning when booking the trip was excellent.  I worked with the hotel manager, who was very courteous helpful.  He assured me that he would personally see that they were well taken care of and that their stay would be a pleasant one.  My granddaughters were very pleased with the accommodations, the cleanliness of the hotel, the friendliness of the Manager and all of the staff.  I would definitely stay here the next time we're in California.

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay in OC
Summary: The hotel accommodations and food are excellent, especially the warm and fresh cookies.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  The hotel was very busy for both nights of my stay, but the staff had things under control.  The lobby was full of guest checking in when I arrived, but they had me checked in and in my room in no time at all.  When we arrived back to the hotel late Saturday night, the self parking lot was full, but the valet staff took care of my car and parking at no charge.  The beds are very comfortable and everything in my room was clean.  The hotel is also conveniently located next to the 55 and 405 Freeways, making traveling to various spots in Orange County easier.

The hotel was in a good location and the room were very clean. Staff was very friendly and parking was good only you had to pay for the parking this should be free to all customers. Had no issues with the room or the staff.

This hotel offers excellent accomodations, food, and customer service.  The complementary shuttle to the John Wayne Airport is very convenient.  The hotel is quiet and in a park like setting which is good for morning and evening walks.

Check-in was super easy and efficient on a Friday evening.  We were in OC for a baptism off the 55 so location was excellent.  Not too far from Disneyland and not too far from Long Beach and pretty close to Huntington Beach all of which we visited during our quick 2 night stay.  Front desk was very friendly.  Pleased with our room, the corner king.  Clean and comfy.  Loved having a fridge and coffee in the room. Second night the hotel was packed due to a wedding, however the only issue then was parking and I had to valet.  Valet staff was very friendly and helpful.  The breakfast was the standard buffet for Hiltons so was bummed when we had to pay extra for that when we normally get the breakfast buffet included at the other hotels.  Was fine, nothing great.  Would have like

This was my first trip back to the area that I called home for 30 years and it obvioulsy required a hotel stay. The check-in was a little rough because I requested a lake view corner king and instead, they gave me a lake view facing the freeway so was put in a room above the banquet room and it was a little loud on Saturday but the remaning three days were quiet and peaceful. I am an avid swimmer so pools are a must where I stay and chose this hotel for that reason and it was beautiful, either over chlorinated or ocean water in the pool but it was great for laps and jacuzzi was a little tired looking but was serviceable. Front staff went over and beyond the call of duty with bottled water and cookies and were very friendly. Valet was a little aggressive at times although I paid
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing us on Tripadvisor.com!    I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed our pool!   Majority of our guests love soaking up the sun and enjoy taking a dip!   We are in the process of scheduling dates to refinish the pool and spa to better improve the appearance.  Stay tuned!   I apologize for my parking staff being aggressive towards you.   I will address this with the Parking Manager to ensure this doesn't happen again.     Please let me know if you have any questions or additional comments.  Best Regards,  David Arriola Director of Operations & Revenue Management/Social Media Marketing DoubleTree Club by Hilton Orange County Airport  Phone: (714) 751-2400 Email: david.arriola2@hilton.com

Summary: Stayed on business over a weekday.  3rd floor guests were openly fighting in the hallways all night long and kicking roomservice plates down the halls, spilling drinks in the elevators.  I went down to the desk twice to correct this issue, once at midnight and another at 3 am.  The desk made some measly gestures at sending a security guard up to look scary, but the guests continued unabated, so I didn't sleep.  I was willing to give this place a second chance, but then when I went to the desk the next morning and spoke with the morning staff they had received no notification from the night staff that there were any issues over night.  I checked out, 100% certain that in a place with such poor management and communication between shifts, that I would be up all night.  BTW,
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback of our hotel. We’re very sorry for the noise issue you encountered during your stay. Your comfort and safety is our number one concern, and we appreciate that you brought this to our attention. In addition, we apologize that you were unhappy with the parking and internet charges, and we're sorry if the charges weren’t clear when you booked the room. Your review will help us correct similar issues in the future as we work to improve our overall guest experience. We hope that the next time you’re in the area, you’ll consider staying with us again.   Feel free to contact me directly with any additional concerns or questions.  Best Regards,  David J. Arriola DoubleTree Club by Hilton Orange County Airport Director of Operations/Revenue Management  Phone: (714) 751-2400 Email: david.arriola2@hilton.com

Summary Heading: Very good, quiet hotel convenient to Irvine and Santa Ana
Summary: We just stayed for 6 days at the Doubletree Club, and it was a good choice:  close to everything in Irvine but far enough from the John Wayne flight paths to be very quiet. It's also very easy to get to the beaches by zooming down route 55, or further north or south on 405.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing us on Tripadvisor.com!   I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated as it helps us improve our quality of our services and amenities.    I'm glad you enjoyed our convenient location to the freeways.   I always say we're in the heart of Orange County and provide easy access to all major Orange County destinations.     Thank you again and we hope to have you stay in the near future.  Best Regards,  David J. Arriola Director of Operations & Revenue Management/Social Media Marketing  DoubleTree Club by Hilton Orange County Airport  Phone: (714) 751-2400 Email: david.arriola2@hilton.com

Summary: From the moment we pulled into that parking lot and on the property, until the moment we left, we received attentive, friendly customer service. The facilities were well-maintained and clean.  We had a great experience and will undoubtedly return and would recommend this hotel to anyone in search of great service and a great facility for an exceptional value.

Summary Heading: Terrible Front Desk Service at Check in
Summary: Nice, but it is Not the hotel you see on the website, It is still a very nice hotel for the money, However Front desk service late at night was terrible, Internet (wireless) is not complimentary they charge for it, as Well as they charge for parking, It is close easy access to the interstate.

I stayed here because they had a great promotional rate that included breakfast and free internet.  The hotel is newer and well kept.  It is close to the airport and not too far from shopping. I used the shuttle service that picked me up at the airport and offered to take me to the mall or anywhere within 2 miles of the Hotel.  The room was nice and it had a small refrigerator and a safe.  The internet worked really well with good speeds.  The A/C worked, but only if you set it to 62 degrees.  The breakfast was really good with good service.  Full buffet and an omelet station. The gym is a small room with very little equipment; they did have water, towels and wipes.

My wife and I stayed here for one night on a trip to SoCal.  Although it was a short stay, it was great!  We were warmly welcomed upon arrival, and in addition to the standard HHonors elite benefits, we were each offered a drink coupon to use at the bar on the house!  We were given a room on the top floor overlooking the small lake in front of the hotel - nice view, and adds ambiance to the hotel.  Room was large and the bed was very comfortable.  Service throughout the hotel was warm and friendly.  The hotel's location is a plus, conveniently located to the 55 and 405 freeways, and a short (5-10 minute) drive from SNA, and probably 15-25 from Disney World.  It's also a good choice if your SoCal vacation includes both LA and San Diego; it's about halfway to both, so if you don't

This is one of two DoubleTree Hotels in the same block near the Santa Ana airport.  All these hotels are high standard hotels so I'll just mention the things that are worth noting.  This particular Double tree has an outside breakfast area as well as an inside one. The outside area overlooks a giant man-made pond with a fountain which is quite pleasant to dine near in the morning. Their breakfast buffet was pretty good and their Diamond member breakfast vouchers allowed full use of the breakfast buffet facility at no extra charge. Self serve coffee and juice so no need to tip anyone unless you want to since you never deal with the waiter.  The rooms were clean and adequate. No issue there. The hot tub/pool area however was outside and so on a cold night, that might be

Being a Las Vegas Resident I am use to a level of service that is absent when I travel. This Hotel is very close to what I expect when I go on my stay-cations in Vegas. From the wait staff to housekeeping, The indifference that has been shown at other California Hotels is not here. This quiet hide away location with the access to everything Orange County makes it a great place to relax and still enjoy all the bussle the county has to offer.

I have stayed here four times on business over the past five years. I love the staff here. Consistently, they are warm, caring, friendly, and very eager to please. The rooms are great. I love the jacuzzi and the pool, and while the fitness room is small, it has free weights--a big plus--and an exercise bike in addition to two treadmills. The small lake right outside the door, complete with resident ducks, provides a nice view and a great place for a refreshing walk. The restaurant stands out for both  its food and the service. Location very close to the Orange County airport is perfect. Travelers sensitive to noise might want to ask for a room away from the freeway.

Good and quiet business area, but the walls are so thin that you can hear people on top, and next to your room. Needless to say, you can also hear flushes and showers running. Parking is a bit more affordable, but I prefer the COurtyard next door.

I have stayed at this hotel numerous times during weekend getaways to Orange County for years and I continue to return due to its location, value, and the superb attitude of the staff. It is minutes from SNA, weekend rates usually are quite competitive, and the staff always is positive--everyone from the parking valets to front desk staff to restaurant staff to housekeeping to management truly enjoys working at this hotel and it shows. Staff lent a very helpful (and welcomed!) hand when I needed a forgotten phone charger and handled a busy weekend evening in the parking lot deftly and efficiently. There was a minor problem with the in-room phone, but once I alerted the front desk I feel confident that it will be resolved promptly. Fortunately I was able to receive it as a

The location of their hotel to the airport can not be beat, super close!  It's a bum to have to pay for parking.  The staff was extremely friendly and accommodating. Upon finding out I am allergic to down they sent two people to remake my bed, that almost never happens! I was super impressed.  Nice and clean, comfy bed, and the bathroom was roomy with a great showerhead.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing us on Tripadvisor.com!   I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  We love to see our guests well taken care of and I am glad you got the opportunity to experience this first hand.   We have some amazing packages that include parking.  Check them out on our website when you have a chance and we look forward to having you stay with us in the near future.    Best Regards,  David J. Arriola Director of Operations/Revenue Management & Social Media Marketing  DoubleTree Club by Hilton Orange County Airport (714) 751-2400 david.arriola2@hilton.com

Summary: Fantastic staff, very clean and updated.  We were there for three nights and I don't have any complaints.  Would stay again if in the area.  All of the staff and employees that I encountered were super nice.  It seemed as if they honestly enjoyed working there.  I didn't use the restaurant so I can't say how the food was but everything else was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing us on Tripadvisor.com!  It's great to hear that you enjoyed your stay!   Our staff LOVES working at our hotel and I'm glad you observed that personally!  We would love to have you try our restaurant next time you stay with us.   Enjoy the rest of your week and we look forward to your next visit!    Best Regards,  David J. Arriola Director of Operations/Revenue Management & Social Media Marketing DoubleTree Club by Hilton Orange County Airport (714) 751-2400 david.arriola2@hilton.com

Summary Heading: The staff makes you feel at home.
Summary: My family has stayed at this particular double tree several times. The staff is wonderful and very accommodating. Everybody from the valet parking when you first arrive to the front desk when you check out. Rooms are very clean and hotel is very quiet. I will definitely stay at this property again in the near future. Highly recommended!!
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing us on Tripadvisor.com!  I'm extremely happy that you enjoyed your visit to our hotel.   We take pride in providing amazing service and amenities.   We look forward to having you stay with us in the near future.    Thank you again,  David J. Arriola Director of Operations/Revenue Management & Social Media Marketing DoubleTree Club by Hilton Orange County Airport (714) 751-2400 david.arriola2@hilton.com

Summary: Hotel front desk personnel are wonderful - they never gave my kids a hard time about wanting extra cookies and were so personable.  Rooms are nice, updated and beds comfy although a little soft for our liking.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing us on Tripadvisor.com!    We love giving out our warm signature DoubleTree by Hilton Chocolate Chip & Walnut cookies!   Please come back and get more!  It's our pleasure because we CARE!    Thank you again and we look forward to having you stay with us in the near future.  Best Regards,  David J. Arriola Director of Operations/Revenue Management & Social Media Marketing DoubleTree Club by Hilton Orange County Airport  david.arriola2@hilton.com (714) 751-2400

Summary Heading: A cloud in the middle of Orange County
Summary: The hotel was great and the location was perfect. The beds are RIDICULOUSLY comfortable. I wish I can sleep in them every day for the rest of my life! The hotel is very centrally located and with easy access to the highway and shopping centers. Every night the staff offered a warm cookie for each of us and were extremely friendly. The continental breakfast was a plus. The food was very tasty and professionally displayed. Honestly, I do not know why will anybody stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!   I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed sleeping in our wonderful Sweet Dreams beds!    We hope to have you back soon!     Best Regards,  David J. Arriola Director of Operations/Revenue Management & Social Media Marketing david.arriola2@hilton.com (714) 751-2400

Summary: Travel a lot, and do not stay at Doubletree much.  The room was O.K., but when you look closely is needed some work.  I do not like hotels that have older, through the wall heating/air units, as you have trouble regulating room temp, as was the case here.    I tried to us the Fitness Center, but 2 or the 3 machines were in operable.  I tried to get a bottle of Diet Coke from the vending machine on my floor, but it would not take the bills.  I had the same issue on 3 other floors before I finally got a machine that worked.  I talked to another traveler that was having the same issue.  I stayed here because it was close to where I needed to be, but next trip here I will definitely find somewhere else to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing us on Tripadvisor.com!    Your feedback is very important to us as it helps us improve the quality of our amenities and services.   I apologize that our vending machines were not working properly.  I addressed this issue with the company that manages the machines to have them inspect them to ensure they are working properly.     Thank you again for your response.  Please contact me directly if you have any other concerns or questions.    Best Regards,  David J. Arriola Director of Operations/Revenue Management  & Social Media Marketing david.arriola2@Hilton.com (714) 751-2400

Summary Heading: Great choice in OC near SNA.
Summary: Having a client in Costa Mesa, I have been staying in the OC a lot lately. My last trip I stayed three nights at the Doubletree Club.  There are two Doubletrees within spitting distance of each other, and I have to think that some of the reviews here are for the other Doubletree on MacArthur.  Both charge for parking - but this one charges $11 for self parking or valet.  This one is set back a bit from the main road, on a man made "lake" in an office park setting right next to Rte 55.  All of the staff I encountered during my stay were fantastic. Rooms were big and clean.  Bed and pillows were comfortable. Flat screen TV, HD channels. Renovated bathrooms. The only things the rooms could use are more plugs - I had to plug my phone in across the room from the bed, instead of on

Stayed here for one night on a business trip, chose this hotel because I was getting in late and wanted a hotel with a restaurant inside.  The lobby is nice, the restaurant and bar look like they were fitted into a corner of the hotel that would have otherwise been used for receptions, in other words, the design wasn't great.  My dinner at the restaurant was good and they had a nice, small selection of wines.  The service was excellent.  My room was nicely appointed but smelled strongly of cigarette smoke.  I didn't let the front desk know because it was late and I just really didn't want to go through the hassle.  But, doesn't housekeeping warn anyone that the room smells?  The bed was very comfortable and I didn't here any noise at all.  I had room service for breakfast with

The hotel was very nice.  We were not offered our complimentary cookie on check in but when we took our bags to our room, we asked for the cookie and was given it with their apologies.  We were in town for my brother's retirement the weekend we were in CA. We had stayed at your hotel in the past and it was very convenient to where we needed to be.

Horrible experience with room, smelled of old cigarette smoke.  Must have been a smoking floor in the past. Air unit was broken and blew out a toxic smell.  Pillows were awful. Made for a very restless night and a long next day. Would not book there again.  Marriott across the street for next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing us Tripadvisor.com!   I apologize that you did not enjoy your stay with us.   We addressed the smoking smell and the other issues you mentioned with our housekeeping department.   We are a 100% non-smoking hotel and we try our best to encourage guests not to smoke in the rooms.   I really hope you can provide us another opportunity to show you that we can provide an amazing experience.  Please contact me directly and I hope to have stay with us in the near future.  I apologize again for any inconvenience.  Best Regards,  David J. Arriola Director of Operations/Revenue Management & Social Media Marketing (714) 751-2400 david.arriola2@hilton.com

Summary: Two nights here gave us good nites of sleep. Rooms were rather large and comfortable.  Nice fluffy towels and bath amenities.  Liked having the Wall Street Journal in the mornings.  Fitness center was well equipped and clean. Charged $15.50 for parking but we still had to drive around in the ramp looking for a place to park as they had a wedding reception that nite. Very frustrating.

Summary Heading: Nice room, Nice staff, Bad elevator service and odd bathroom
Summary: Stayed here so I could be close to Newport Beach for the night.  Got a 1 king sofa bed room for 20,000 HHonors points.  Room was surprisingly nice compared to the last DoubleTree I stayed at.  Room was nice and spacious.  There seemed to be a shortage of wall outlets in the room, only 3 I could find out in the open.  One sad part was the fact the window didn't open at all.  The bathroom was very odd.  Instead of having a regular door, it has a pocket door that doesn't lock.  So unless you are traveling alone or with someone you trust, watch your back!  The temperature gage in the shower was hard to use without burning or scolding yourself.  Shower head was REALLY low.  I'm about 6'2, and had to crouch down to use the shower.  Very little ventilation in the bathroom, so even just

I had business at the UC Irvine and an early flight out of John Wayne/SNA two weeks in a row in April. I had never stayed at this hotel before, but it had an attractive rate. It turned out to be a very good choice. There is nothing very unique about this place, but the rooms are nice, the amenities are good (e.g. the business center), and the location is excellent. There are a number of good inexpensive eating options about two blocks north (reachable via the path along the pond if you want nice scenery). I've stayed there twice and I'd likely do it again.

I found the hotel to be in a centralized location and easy to access.  the amenities were satisfactory and the staff helpful.  The hot breakfast with multiple choices is a plus and the lounge area is a good meeting place in the evening.  I would stay here for business or with a family.

We've been to this hotel several time over the years and are always happy wtih our stay. The rooms are lovely (we had a corner room this time) and comfortable. We enjoy the cookies and take them up on the offer to have them more than once! We used the shuttle twice over the weekend to South Coast Plaza so we could enjoy a lovely dinner with wine and not have to worry about driving. The shuttle personnel were friendly and timely.  We'd go back to this hotel again.

Summary Heading: Expensive - don't get much for what you pay
Summary: While I was happy with the stay and the warm cookie upon arrive. I was very hungry, as I had not had a chance to eat due to travel. I found one vending machine. There were not a lot of options, I was hoping I could grab something small. So I decided to go to their restaurant. From just the menu, I can tell that the restaurant is not given much thought by the company. The menu was dirty and the food was more what you would find at a diner, but the price was high. There were very few other options in the immediate area for food.   I wasn't thrilled to find out I would have to pay for internet. Perhaps the cost of the hotel was high but I had just stayed in Palo Alto: paid less, received free internet (in addition to many public consoles free to use and print) and they had a little
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review of your recent stay with us. We apologize we were not able to provide you with the amenities you expected and deserve during your stay. Your feedback will help us to improve our dining and Internet options to ensure every guest has the best stay possible. Thank you again and feel free to contact me directly if you have any other comments or questions.    Best Regards,  David J. Arriola Director of Operations and Revenue Management/Social Media Marketing DoubleTree Club by Hilton Orange County Airport david.arriola2@hilton.com

Summary: At first we didn't want to stay here Bc we thought it would be too far away from Disneyland but it wasn't ! Only a 10-12 minute drive! The staff was very helpful to what we needed- a few docs scanned, a microwave in the room to helping me in the morning put some milk in to go cups! And everyone's help was very quick! We were very pleased with our 5 day stay.

Summary Heading: Double Tree Club in Santa Ana, CA
Summary: We love the Double Tree Club Hotel in Santa Ana, CA.  We've stayed there three times and have never been disappointed.  Their price is affordable and the accommodations are beautiful.  The location is easy to find and you have easy access to the highway.  We love the business center it is located next to and always take a walk around the pond when staying in Santa Ana.   We have always felt safe there and the staff is very gracious.  One more thing...they have delicious chocolate chip cookies waiting for you when you arrive!

Our room was nice and clean. The hotel is only minutes from Disneyland and has a free reliable shuttle. The Buffett breakfast is very good and you can get it to go to eat on the way to Disney. I will stay here the next time I visit Disneyland.

Summary Heading: A nice hotel with an attractive outdoor area.
Summary: The small restaurant looks out on an attractive pond and there is outdoor seating for food or drinks.  The hotel is clean and quiet with friendly and helpful staff. The rooms are comfortable.  My rate included a breakfast buffet and it was fine and it was served on china.  They brought me coffee as well.

We stayed here on Easter weekend so we could be close to the sunrise service we had planned on going to over a year ago.   Unfortunately we got maybe three hours of sleep due to a very loud and obnoxious wedding party and a overly zealous DJ.    Called down to the desk to let them know that the party was keeping everyone awake and all they said was the party was booked until midnight and the staff pretty much let the wedding have free reign over the area.    The party was still going on at 12:45 and people were right outside the rooms yelling and talking and carrying on.  They finally sent security down to disburse the crowd.    I wish the staff would of informed us of a wedding that was going on late when we checked in so we could of moved to a different area or something.

Summary Heading: The Right Balance for the Price
Summary: This hotel fit the need for a good nights sleep in a clean room. The staff was very friendly and the stay was enjoyable. The only negative was one of the Buffet breakfast. For a hotel to offer free breakfast to Loyalty is nice. However it was cheap and poorly presented. It was served on styrofoam plates that don't match with eggs that are  left get cold on a buffet line with no heat source below and bacon that may be less bacon and more salt pork is not a way to cut cost let alone present a breakfast. Will I stay here again for the VALUE but please look what you are putting out for your guests.  Even its free we do tell others.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing us on Tripadvisor.com!   Your comments and feedback are very important to us as we use this information to better our quality of services and amenities.    I apologize that you did not enjoy our breakfast.    We usually get great comments about our breakfast buffet but I will address these issues with our Food & Beverage Director to ensure this does not happen in the future.   Thank you again for the feedback and I look forward to having you stay with us in the near future.  Best Regards,  David J. Arriola Director of Operations/Revenue Management & Social Media Marketing DoubleTree Club by Hilton Orange County Airport  Phone: (714) 751-2400 Email: david.arriola2@hilton.com

Summary: I was greeted...very friendly front desk staff.  They couldn't have been more attentive and informative during check-in.  The room smelled so fresh and nice...the best I've ever experienced.  I had dinner in the restaurant and the hotel manager was there checking to make sure everything was acceptable.  For the first time this week, I ordered salmon cooked rare and actually got it!  And, it was a very generous portion.  I would certainly stay here again and would recommend it to anyone.

I am so impressed with this hotel.  I felt extremely welcome and all of the employees are so nice and attentive.  The Doubletree is conveniently located near the airport, several malls, and multiple places to eat.  You don't need to rent a car because the hotel shuttle can take you up to a four mile radius around the hotel.  Regarding the food at the hotel restaurant, it's wonderful.  I have had breakfast, lunch, and dinner here and I have not been disappointed yet.  The rooms are comfortable and clean, and the beds are cozy.

We stayed here prior to an early departure out of John Wayne Airport.  They graciously let us check in early to a lovely room for a day of shopping at South Coast prior to our departure.  The room was immaculate, lovely linens and comfy bed. Wish we could have stayed longer!

We stayed here Saturday night, last minute booking on Hotwire. Wanted to enjoy the 80 degrees in Newport Beach and Laguna. Nice, well appointed  room. Nice view of small lake. Rate is half of other hotels in area. Drawback:, $11.00 parking, a minor nuisance, as room was under $60.00 for a weekend. Great value, friendly front desk and valet service. Would recommend if you don't mind driving a few miles to beach, South Coast Plaza.

I am not sure why I have not previously reviewed this property. I stay here often and always have a great stay. I probably take them for granted......like some comfortable piece of clothing...shoes come to mind. Reliable, great fit, comfortable, great relationship, recognize my presence, never let me down, accomodating to whatever unexpected stress I expose them too....you get the picture I hope.     The breakfast service in the restaurant is also spectacular. If you don't see what you want....just ask. They are wonderfully accomodating. Given health issues I am always conscious of the food intake.  This is in my opininion an awesome property. I stay on business. if noise averse ask for a lakeside room. Away from 55/405 guaranteeing a supremely quiet evening. Meanwhile if

Summary Heading: Excellent facility, Excellent service, Excellent Hospitality
Summary: We stayed a three days at this hotel. The service was great at every area. We did not realize that a complimentary breakfast buffet and cocktail hour were included, The parking is at reasonable rate. Shuttle service is very good and front desk staff are fantastic and friendly. Wish you all the best.

We were in the city for a wedding and right from check-in to check out the experience was great. The rooms were spacious, clean and it is off 55 and easy to get to 5 and 405. The breakfast buffet was great, the cookies upon check-in were good. The staff were very friendly and helpful. Will stay there again. Thank you once again.

Had I paid full price to stay at this "3.5-star" hotel, I would have been angry.  I thought the location was great, considering that it's at the edge of Santa Ana bordering Irvine.  The room was clean, the bed was comfortable, and the pond outside was a nice touch.  However, that's about as far as the positives with this hotel.  This hotel is located right next to the freeway and if you're one of those unlucky ones, such as myself, who was stuck with a room facing the freeway, you won't get much sleep.  It doesn't help that they play music 24/7 at this hotel, which can be heard through the paper-thin walls all night long.
